00037 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 // Shared code for samples to ask user if they want to use a REF device or quit
00039 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 void DXUTDisplaySwitchingToREFWarning()
00041 {
00042     if( DXUTGetShowMsgBoxOnError() )
00043     {
00044         // Open the appropriate registry key
00045         DWORD dwSkipWarning = 0;
00046         HKEY hKey;
00047         LONG lResult = RegOpenKeyEx( HKEY_CURRENT_USER, L"Software\\Microsoft\\DirectX 9.0 SDK", 0, KEY_READ, &hKey );
00048         if( ERROR_SUCCESS == lResult ) 
00049         {
00050             DWORD dwType;
00051             DWORD dwSize = sizeof(DWORD);
00052             lResult = RegQueryValueEx( hKey, L"Skip Warning On REF", NULL, &dwType, (BYTE*)&dwSkipWarning, &dwSize );
00053             RegCloseKey( hKey );
00054         }
00055 
00056         if( dwSkipWarning == 0 )
00057         {
00058             // Compact code to create a custom dialog box without using a template in a resource file.
00059             // If this dialog were in a .rc file, this would be a lot simpler but every sample calling this function would
00060             // need a copy of the dialog in its own .rc file. Also MessageBox API could be used here instead, but 
00061             // the MessageBox API is simpler to call but it can't provide a "Don't show again" checkbox
00062             typedef struct { DLGITEMTEMPLATE a; WORD b; WORD c; WORD d; WORD e; WORD f; } DXUT_DLG_ITEM; 
00063             typedef struct { DLGTEMPLATE a; WORD b; WORD c; WCHAR d[2]; WORD e; WCHAR f[14]; DXUT_DLG_ITEM i1; DXUT_DLG_ITEM i2; DXUT_DLG_ITEM i3; DXUT_DLG_ITEM i4; DXUT_DLG_ITEM i5; } DXUT_DLG_DATA; 
00064 
00065             DXUT_DLG_DATA dtp = 
00066             {                                                                                                                                                  
00067                 {WS_CAPTION|WS_POPUP|WS_VISIBLE|WS_SYSMENU|DS_ABSALIGN|DS_3DLOOK|DS_SETFONT|DS_MODALFRAME|DS_CENTER,0,5,0,0,269,82},0,0,L" ",8,L"MS Sans Serif", 
00068                 {{WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|SS_ICON|SS_CENTERIMAGE,0,7,7,24,24,0x100},0xFFFF,0x0082,0,0,0}, // icon
00069                 {{WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE,0,40,7,230,25,0x101},0xFFFF,0x0082,0,0,0}, // static text
00070                 {{WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|BS_DEFPUSHBUTTON,0,80,39,50,14,IDYES},0xFFFF,0x0080,0,0,0}, // Yes button
00071                 {{WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE,0,133,39,50,14,IDNO},0xFFFF,0x0080,0,0,0}, // No button
00072                 {{WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|BS_CHECKBOX,0,7,59,70,16,IDIGNORE},0xFFFF,0x0080,0,0,0}, // checkbox
00073             }; 
00074 
00075             int nResult = (int) DialogBoxIndirect( DXUTGetHINSTANCE(), (DLGTEMPLATE*)&dtp, DXUTGetHWND(), DisplaySwitchToREFWarningProc ); 
00076 
00077             if( (nResult & 0x80) == 0x80 ) // "Don't show again" checkbox was checked
00078             {
00079                 lResult = RegOpenKeyEx( HKEY_CURRENT_USER, L"Software\\Microsoft\\DirectX 9.0 SDK", 0, KEY_WRITE, &hKey );
00080                 if( ERROR_SUCCESS == lResult ) 
00081                 {
00082                     dwSkipWarning = 1;
00083                     RegSetValueEx( hKey, L"Skip Warning On REF", 0, REG_DWORD, (BYTE*)&dwSkipWarning, sizeof(DWORD) );
00084                     RegCloseKey( hKey );
00085                 }
00086             }
00087 
00088             // User choose not to continue
00089             if( (nResult & 0x0F) == IDNO )
00090                 DXUTShutdown(1);
00091         }
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 // MsgProc for DXUTDisplaySwitchingToREFWarning() dialog box
00098 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 INT_PTR CALLBACK DisplaySwitchToREFWarningProc(HWND hDlg, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam) 
00100 { 
00101     switch (message) 
00102     { 
00103         case WM_INITDIALOG:
00104             // Easier to set text here than in the DLGITEMTEMPLATE
00105             SetWindowText( hDlg, DXUTGetWindowTitle() );
00106             SendMessage( GetDlgItem(hDlg, 0x100), STM_SETIMAGE, IMAGE_ICON, (LPARAM)LoadIcon(0, IDI_QUESTION));
00107             SetDlgItemText( hDlg, 0x101, L"Switching to the Direct3D reference rasterizer, a software device\nthat implements the entire Direct3D feature set, but runs very slowly.\nDo you wish to continue?" ); 
00108             SetDlgItemText( hDlg, IDYES, L"&Yes" );
00109             SetDlgItemText( hDlg, IDNO, L"&No" );
00110             SetDlgItemText( hDlg, IDIGNORE, L"&Don't show again" );
00111             break;
00112 
00113         case WM_COMMAND: 
00114             switch (LOWORD(wParam)) 
00115             { 
00116                 case IDIGNORE: CheckDlgButton( hDlg, IDIGNORE, (IsDlgButtonChecked( hDlg, IDIGNORE ) == BST_CHECKED) ? BST_UNCHECKED : BST_CHECKED ); EnableWindow( GetDlgItem( hDlg, IDNO ), (IsDlgButtonChecked( hDlg, IDIGNORE ) != BST_CHECKED) ); break;
00117                 case IDNO: EndDialog(hDlg, (IsDlgButtonChecked( hDlg, IDIGNORE ) == BST_CHECKED) ? IDNO|0x80 : IDNO|0x00 ); return TRUE; 
00118                 case IDCANCEL:
00119                 case IDYES: EndDialog(hDlg, (IsDlgButtonChecked( hDlg, IDIGNORE ) == BST_CHECKED) ? IDYES|0x80 : IDYES|0x00 ); return TRUE; 
00120             } 
00121             break;
00122     } 
00123     return FALSE; 
00124 }

00127 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 CDXUTTimer::CDXUTTimer()
00129 {
00130     m_bUsingQPF         = false;
00131     m_bTimerStopped     = true;
00132     m_llQPFTicksPerSec  = 0;
00133 
00134     m_llStopTime        = 0;
00135     m_llLastElapsedTime = 0;
00136     m_llBaseTime        = 0;
00137 
00138     // Use QueryPerformanceFrequency() to get frequency of timer.  
00139     LARGE_INTEGER qwTicksPerSec;
00140     m_bUsingQPF = (bool) (QueryPerformanceFrequency( &qwTicksPerSec ) != 0);
00141     m_llQPFTicksPerSec = qwTicksPerSec.QuadPart;
00142 }
00143 
00144 
00145 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 void CDXUTTimer::Reset()
00147 {
00148     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00149         return;
00150 
00151     // Get either the current time or the stop time
00152     LARGE_INTEGER qwTime;
00153     if( m_llStopTime != 0 )
00154         qwTime.QuadPart = m_llStopTime;
00155     else
00156         QueryPerformanceCounter( &qwTime );
00157 
00158     m_llBaseTime        = qwTime.QuadPart;
00159     m_llLastElapsedTime = qwTime.QuadPart;
00160     m_llStopTime        = 0;
00161     m_bTimerStopped     = FALSE;
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 void CDXUTTimer::Start()
00167 {
00168     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00169         return;
00170 
00171     // Get the current time
00172     LARGE_INTEGER qwTime;
00173     QueryPerformanceCounter( &qwTime );
00174 
00175     if( m_bTimerStopped )
00176         m_llBaseTime += qwTime.QuadPart - m_llStopTime;
00177     m_llStopTime = 0;
00178     m_llLastElapsedTime = qwTime.QuadPart;
00179     m_bTimerStopped = FALSE;
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 void CDXUTTimer::Stop()
00185 {
00186     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00187         return;
00188 
00189     if( !m_bTimerStopped )
00190     {
00191         // Get either the current time or the stop time
00192         LARGE_INTEGER qwTime;
00193         if( m_llStopTime != 0 )
00194             qwTime.QuadPart = m_llStopTime;
00195         else
00196             QueryPerformanceCounter( &qwTime );
00197 
00198         m_llStopTime = qwTime.QuadPart;
00199         m_llLastElapsedTime = qwTime.QuadPart;
00200         m_bTimerStopped = TRUE;
00201     }
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206 void CDXUTTimer::Advance()
00207 {
00208     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00209         return;
00210 
00211     m_llStopTime += m_llQPFTicksPerSec/10;
00212 }
00213

00215 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 double CDXUTTimer::GetAbsoluteTime()
00217 {
00218     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00219         return -1.0;
00220 
00221     // Get either the current time or the stop time
00222     LARGE_INTEGER qwTime;
00223     if( m_llStopTime != 0 )
00224         qwTime.QuadPart = m_llStopTime;
00225     else
00226         QueryPerformanceCounter( &qwTime );
00227 
00228     double fTime = qwTime.QuadPart / (double) m_llQPFTicksPerSec;
00229 
00230     return fTime;
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00235 double CDXUTTimer::GetTime()
00236 {
00237     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00238         return -1.0;
00239 
00240     // Get either the current time or the stop time
00241     LARGE_INTEGER qwTime;
00242     if( m_llStopTime != 0 )
00243         qwTime.QuadPart = m_llStopTime;
00244     else
00245         QueryPerformanceCounter( &qwTime );
00246 
00247     double fAppTime = (double) ( qwTime.QuadPart - m_llBaseTime ) / (double) m_llQPFTicksPerSec;
00248 
00249     return fAppTime;
00250 }
00251 
00252 
00253 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 double CDXUTTimer::GetElapsedTime()
00255 {
00256     if( !m_bUsingQPF )
00257         return -1.0;
00258 
00259     // Get either the current time or the stop time
00260     LARGE_INTEGER qwTime;
00261     if( m_llStopTime != 0 )
00262         qwTime.QuadPart = m_llStopTime;
00263     else
00264         QueryPerformanceCounter( &qwTime );
00265 
00266     double fElapsedTime = (double) ( qwTime.QuadPart - m_llLastElapsedTime ) / (double) m_llQPFTicksPerSec;
00267     m_llLastElapsedTime = qwTime.QuadPart;
00268 
00269     return fElapsedTime;
00270 }

00297 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00298 HRESULT DXUTSetMediaSearchPath( LPCWSTR strPath )
00299 {
00300     HRESULT hr;
00301 
00302     WCHAR* s_strSearchPath = DXUTMediaSearchPath();
00303 
00304     hr = StringCchCopy( s_strSearchPath, MAX_PATH, strPath );   
00305     if( SUCCEEDED(hr) )
00306     {
00307         // append slash if needed
00308         size_t ch;
00309         hr = StringCchLength( s_strSearchPath, MAX_PATH, &ch );
00310         if( SUCCEEDED(hr) && s_strSearchPath[ch-1] != L'\\')
00311         {
00312             hr = StringCchCat( s_strSearchPath, MAX_PATH, L"\\" );
00313         }
00314     }
00315 
00316     return hr;
00317 }
00318 
00319 
00320 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00321 // Tries to find the location of a SDK media file
00322 //       cchDest is the size in WCHARs of strDestPath.  Be careful not to 
00323 //       pass in sizeof(strDest) on UNICODE builds.
00324 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00325 HRESULT DXUTFindDXSDKMediaFileCch( WCHAR* strDestPath, int cchDest, LPCWSTR strFilename )
00326 {
00327     bool bFound;
00328     WCHAR strSearchFor[MAX_PATH];
00329     
00330     if( NULL==strFilename || strFilename[0] == 0 || NULL==strDestPath || cchDest < 10 )
00331         return E_INVALIDARG;
00332 
00333     // Get the exe name, and exe path
00334     WCHAR strExePath[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00335     WCHAR strExeName[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00336     WCHAR* strLastSlash = NULL;
00337     GetModuleFileName( NULL, strExePath, MAX_PATH );
00338     strExePath[MAX_PATH-1]=0;
00339     strLastSlash = wcsrchr( strExePath, TEXT('\\') );
00340     if( strLastSlash )
00341     {
00342         StringCchCopy( strExeName, MAX_PATH, &strLastSlash[1] );
00343 
00344         // Chop the exe name from the exe path
00345         *strLastSlash = 0;
00346 
00347         // Chop the .exe from the exe name
00348         strLastSlash = wcsrchr( strExeName, TEXT('.') );
00349         if( strLastSlash )
00350             *strLastSlash = 0;
00351     }
00352 
00353     // Typical directories:
00354     //      .\
00355     //      ..\
00356     //      ..\..\
00357     //      %EXE_DIR%\
00358     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\
00359     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\..\
00360     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\%EXE_NAME%
00361     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\..\%EXE_NAME%
00362 
00363     // Typical directory search
00364     bFound = DXUTFindMediaSearchTypicalDirs( strDestPath, cchDest, strFilename, strExePath, strExeName );
00365     if( bFound )
00366         return S_OK;
00367 
00368     // Typical directory search again, but also look in a subdir called "\media\" 
00369     StringCchPrintf( strSearchFor, MAX_PATH, L"media\\%s", strFilename ); 
00370     bFound = DXUTFindMediaSearchTypicalDirs( strDestPath, cchDest, strSearchFor, strExePath, strExeName );
00371     if( bFound )
00372         return S_OK;
00373 
00374     WCHAR strLeafName[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00375 
00376     // Search all parent directories starting at .\ and using strFilename as the leaf name
00377     StringCchCopy( strLeafName, MAX_PATH, strFilename ); 
00378     bFound = DXUTFindMediaSearchParentDirs( strDestPath, cchDest, L".", strLeafName );
00379     if( bFound )
00380         return S_OK;
00381 
00382     // Search all parent directories starting at the exe's dir and using strFilename as the leaf name
00383     bFound = DXUTFindMediaSearchParentDirs( strDestPath, cchDest, strExePath, strLeafName );
00384     if( bFound )
00385         return S_OK;
00386 
00387     // Search all parent directories starting at .\ and using "media\strFilename" as the leaf name
00388     StringCchPrintf( strLeafName, MAX_PATH, L"media\\%s", strFilename ); 
00389     bFound = DXUTFindMediaSearchParentDirs( strDestPath, cchDest, L".", strLeafName );
00390     if( bFound )
00391         return S_OK;
00392 
00393     // Search all parent directories starting at the exe's dir and using "media\strFilename" as the leaf name
00394     bFound = DXUTFindMediaSearchParentDirs( strDestPath, cchDest, strExePath, strLeafName );
00395     if( bFound )
00396         return S_OK;
00397 
00398     // On failure, return the file as the path but also return an error code
00399     StringCchCopy( strDestPath, cchDest, strFilename );
00400 
00401     return DXUTERR_MEDIANOTFOUND;
00402 }
00403 
00404 
00405 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00406 // Search a set of typical directories
00407 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00408 bool DXUTFindMediaSearchTypicalDirs( WCHAR* strSearchPath, int cchSearch, LPCWSTR strLeaf, 
00409                                      WCHAR* strExePath, WCHAR* strExeName )
00410 {
00411     // Typical directories:
00412     //      .\
00413     //      ..\
00414     //      ..\..\
00415     //      %EXE_DIR%\
00416     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\
00417     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\..\
00418     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\%EXE_NAME%
00419     //      %EXE_DIR%\..\..\%EXE_NAME%
00420     //      DXSDK media path
00421 
00422     // Search in .\  
00423     StringCchCopy( strSearchPath, cchSearch, strLeaf ); 
00424     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00425         return true;
00426 
00427     // Search in ..\  
00428     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"..\\%s", strLeaf ); 
00429     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00430         return true;
00431 
00432     // Search in ..\..\ 
00433     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"..\\..\\%s", strLeaf ); 
00434     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00435         return true;
00436 
00437     // Search in ..\..\ 
00438     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"..\\..\\%s", strLeaf ); 
00439     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00440         return true;
00441 
00442     // Search in the %EXE_DIR%\ 
00443     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"%s\\%s", strExePath, strLeaf ); 
00444     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00445         return true;
00446 
00447     // Search in the %EXE_DIR%\..\ 
00448     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"%s\\..\\%s", strExePath, strLeaf ); 
00449     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00450         return true;
00451 
00452     // Search in the %EXE_DIR%\..\..\ 
00453     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"%s\\..\\..\\%s", strExePath, strLeaf ); 
00454     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00455         return true;
00456 
00457     // Search in "%EXE_DIR%\..\%EXE_NAME%\".  This matches the DirectX SDK layout
00458     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"%s\\..\\%s\\%s", strExePath, strExeName, strLeaf ); 
00459     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00460         return true;
00461 
00462     // Search in "%EXE_DIR%\..\..\%EXE_NAME%\".  This matches the DirectX SDK layout
00463     StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"%s\\..\\..\\%s\\%s", strExePath, strExeName, strLeaf ); 
00464     if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00465         return true;
00466 
00467     // Search in media search dir 
00468     WCHAR* s_strSearchPath = DXUTMediaSearchPath();
00469     if( s_strSearchPath[0] != 0 )
00470     {
00471         StringCchPrintf( strSearchPath, cchSearch, L"%s%s", s_strSearchPath, strLeaf ); 
00472         if( GetFileAttributes( strSearchPath ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00473             return true;
00474     }
00475 
00476     return false;
00477 }
00478 
00479 
00480 
00481 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00482 // Search parent directories starting at strStartAt, and appending strLeafName
00483 // at each parent directory.  It stops at the root directory.
00484 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00485 bool DXUTFindMediaSearchParentDirs( WCHAR* strSearchPath, int cchSearch, WCHAR* strStartAt, WCHAR* strLeafName )
00486 {
00487     WCHAR strFullPath[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00488     WCHAR strFullFileName[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00489     WCHAR strSearch[MAX_PATH] = {0};
00490     WCHAR* strFilePart = NULL;
00491 
00492     GetFullPathName( strStartAt, MAX_PATH, strFullPath, &strFilePart );
00493     if( strFilePart == NULL )
00494         return false;
00495    
00496     while( strFilePart != NULL && *strFilePart != '\0' )
00497     {
00498         StringCchPrintf( strFullFileName, MAX_PATH, L"%s\\%s", strFullPath, strLeafName ); 
00499         if( GetFileAttributes( strFullFileName ) != 0xFFFFFFFF )
00500         {
00501             StringCchCopy( strSearchPath, cchSearch, strFullFileName ); 
00502             return true;
00503         }
00504 
00505         StringCchPrintf( strSearch, MAX_PATH, L"%s\\..", strFullPath ); 
00506         GetFullPathName( strSearch, MAX_PATH, strFullPath, &strFilePart );
00507     }
00508 
00509     return false;
00510 }

00528 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateTextureFromFile( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, LPCTSTR pSrcFile, LPDIRECT3DTEXTURE9 *ppTexture )
00529 {
00530     return CreateTextureFromFileEx( pDevice, pSrcFile, D3DX_DEFAULT, D3DX_DEFAULT, D3DX_DEFAULT,
00531                                     0, D3DFMT_UNKNOWN, D3DPOOL_MANAGED, D3DX_DEFAULT, D3DX_DEFAULT,
00532                                     0, NULL, NULL, ppTexture );
00533 }
00534 
00535 
00536 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00537 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateTextureFromFileEx( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, LPCTSTR pSrcFile, UINT Width, UINT Height, UINT MipLevels, DWORD Usage, D3DFORMAT Format, D3DPOOL Pool, DWORD Filter, DWORD MipFilter, D3DCOLOR ColorKey, D3DXIMAGE_INFO *pSrcInfo, PALETTEENTRY *pPalette, LPDIRECT3DTEXTURE9 *ppTexture )
00538 {
00539     // Search the cache for a matching entry.
00540     for( int i = 0; i < m_TextureCache.GetSize(); ++i )
00541     {
00542         DXUTCache_Texture &Entry = m_TextureCache[i];
00543         if( Entry.Location == DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_FILE &&
00544             !lstrcmpW( Entry.wszSource, pSrcFile ) &&
00545             Entry.Width == Width &&
00546             Entry.Height == Height &&
00547             Entry.MipLevels == MipLevels &&
00548             Entry.Usage == Usage &&
00549             Entry.Format == Format &&
00550             Entry.Pool == Pool &&
00551             Entry.Type == D3DRTYPE_TEXTURE )
00552         {
00553             // A match is found. Obtain the IDirect3DTexture9 interface and return that.
00554             return Entry.pTexture->QueryInterface( IID_IDirect3DTexture9, (LPVOID*)ppTexture );
00555         }
00556     }
00557 
00558     HRESULT hr;
00559 
00560     // No matching entry.  Load the resource and create a new entry.
00561     hr = D3DXCreateTextureFromFileEx( pDevice, pSrcFile, Width, Height, MipLevels, Usage, Format,
00562                                       Pool, Filter, MipFilter, ColorKey, pSrcInfo, pPalette, ppTexture );
00563     if( FAILED( hr ) )
00564         return hr;
00565 
00566     DXUTCache_Texture NewEntry;
00567     NewEntry.Location = DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_FILE;
00568     StringCchCopy( NewEntry.wszSource, MAX_PATH, pSrcFile );
00569     NewEntry.Width = Width;
00570     NewEntry.Height = Height;
00571     NewEntry.MipLevels = MipLevels;
00572     NewEntry.Usage = Usage;
00573     NewEntry.Format = Format;
00574     NewEntry.Pool = Pool;
00575     NewEntry.Type = D3DRTYPE_TEXTURE;
00576     (*ppTexture)->QueryInterface( IID_IDirect3DBaseTexture9, (LPVOID*)&NewEntry.pTexture );
00577 
00578     m_TextureCache.Add( NewEntry );
00579     return S_OK;
00580 }

00585 {
00586     return CreateTextureFromResourceEx( pDevice, hSrcModule, pSrcResource, D3DX_DEFAULT, D3DX_DEFAULT,
00587                                         D3DX_DEFAULT, 0, D3DFMT_UNKNOWN, D3DPOOL_MANAGED, D3DX_DEFAULT,
00588                                         D3DX_DEFAULT, 0, NULL, NULL, ppTexture );

00591 
00592 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00593 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateTextureFromResourceEx( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, HMODULE hSrcModule, LPCTSTR pSrcResource, UINT Width, UINT Height, UINT MipLevels, DWORD Usage, D3DFORMAT Format, D3DPOOL Pool, DWORD Filter, DWORD MipFilter, D3DCOLOR ColorKey, D3DXIMAGE_INFO *pSrcInfo, PALETTEENTRY *pPalette, LPDIRECT3DTEXTURE9 *ppTexture )
00594 {
00595     // Search the cache for a matching entry.
00596     for( int i = 0; i < m_TextureCache.GetSize(); ++i )
00597     {
00598         DXUTCache_Texture &Entry = m_TextureCache[i];
00599         if( Entry.Location == DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_RESOURCE &&
00600             Entry.hSrcModule == hSrcModule &&
00601             !lstrcmpW( Entry.wszSource, pSrcResource ) &&
00602             Entry.Width == Width &&
00603             Entry.Height == Height &&
00604             Entry.MipLevels == MipLevels &&
00605             Entry.Usage == Usage &&
00606             Entry.Format == Format &&
00607             Entry.Pool == Pool &&
00608             Entry.Type == D3DRTYPE_TEXTURE )
00609         {
00610             // A match is found. Obtain the IDirect3DTexture9 interface and return that.
00611             return Entry.pTexture->QueryInterface( IID_IDirect3DTexture9, (LPVOID*)ppTexture );
00612         }
00613     }
00614 
00615     HRESULT hr;
00616 
00617     // No matching entry.  Load the resource and create a new entry.
00618     hr = D3DXCreateTextureFromResourceEx( pDevice, hSrcModule, pSrcResource, Width, Height, MipLevels, Usage,
00619                                           Format, Pool, Filter, MipFilter, ColorKey, pSrcInfo, pPalette, ppTexture );
00620     if( FAILED( hr ) )
00621         return hr;
00622 
00623     DXUTCache_Texture NewEntry;
00624     NewEntry.Location = DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_RESOURCE;
00625     NewEntry.hSrcModule = hSrcModule;
00626     StringCchCopy( NewEntry.wszSource, MAX_PATH, pSrcResource );
00627     NewEntry.Width = Width;
00628     NewEntry.Height = Height;
00629     NewEntry.MipLevels = MipLevels;
00630     NewEntry.Usage = Usage;
00631     NewEntry.Format = Format;
00632     NewEntry.Pool = Pool;
00633     NewEntry.Type = D3DRTYPE_TEXTURE;
00634     (*ppTexture)->QueryInterface( IID_IDirect3DBaseTexture9, (LPVOID*)&NewEntry.pTexture );
00635 
00636     m_TextureCache.Add( NewEntry );
00637     return S_OK;
00638 }

00869 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00870 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateFont( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, UINT Height, UINT Width, UINT Weight, UINT MipLevels, BOOL Italic, DWORD CharSet, DWORD OutputPrecision, DWORD Quality, DWORD PitchAndFamily, LPCTSTR pFacename, LPD3DXFONT *ppFont )
00871 {
00872     D3DXFONT_DESCW Desc;
00873     
00874     Desc.Height = Height;
00875     Desc.Width = Width;
00876     Desc.Weight = Weight;
00877     Desc.MipLevels = MipLevels;
00878     Desc.Italic = Italic;
00879     Desc.CharSet = (BYTE)CharSet;
00880     Desc.OutputPrecision = (BYTE)OutputPrecision;
00881     Desc.Quality = (BYTE)Quality;
00882     Desc.PitchAndFamily = (BYTE)PitchAndFamily;
00883     StringCchCopy( Desc.FaceName, LF_FACESIZE, pFacename );
00884 
00885     return CreateFontIndirect( pDevice, &Desc, ppFont );
00886 }
00887 
00888 
00889 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00890 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateFontIndirect( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, CONST D3DXFONT_DESC *pDesc, LPD3DXFONT *ppFont )
00891 {
00892     // Search the cache for a matching entry.
00893     for( int i = 0; i < m_FontCache.GetSize(); ++i )
00894     {
00895         DXUTCache_Font &Entry = m_FontCache[i];
00896 
00897         if( Entry.Width == pDesc->Width &&
00898             Entry.Height == pDesc->Height &&
00899             Entry.Weight == pDesc->Weight &&
00900             Entry.MipLevels == pDesc->MipLevels &&
00901             Entry.Italic == pDesc->Italic &&
00902             Entry.CharSet == pDesc->CharSet &&
00903             Entry.OutputPrecision == pDesc->OutputPrecision &&
00904             Entry.Quality == pDesc->Quality &&
00905             Entry.PitchAndFamily == pDesc->PitchAndFamily &&
00906             CompareString( LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT, NORM_IGNORECASE,
00907                            Entry.FaceName, -1,
00908                            pDesc->FaceName, -1 ) == CSTR_EQUAL )
00909         {
00910             // A match is found.  Increment the reference and return the ID3DXFont object.
00911             Entry.pFont->AddRef();
00912             *ppFont = Entry.pFont;
00913             return S_OK;
00914         }
00915     }
00916 
00917     HRESULT hr;
00918 
00919     // No matching entry.  Load the resource and create a new entry.
00920     hr = D3DXCreateFontIndirect( pDevice, pDesc, ppFont );
00921     if( FAILED( hr ) )
00922         return hr;
00923 
00924     DXUTCache_Font NewEntry;
00925     (D3DXFONT_DESC &)NewEntry = *pDesc;
00926     NewEntry.pFont = *ppFont;
00927     NewEntry.pFont->AddRef();
00928 
00929     m_FontCache.Add( NewEntry );
00930     return S_OK;
00931 }
00932 
00933 
00934 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00935 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateEffectFromFile( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, LPCTSTR pSrcFile, const D3DXMACRO *pDefines, LPD3DXINCLUDE pInclude, DWORD Flags, LPD3DXEFFECTPOOL pPool, LPD3DXEFFECT *ppEffect, LPD3DXBUFFER *ppCompilationErrors )
00936 {
00937     // Search the cache for a matching entry.
00938     for( int i = 0; i < m_EffectCache.GetSize(); ++i )
00939     {
00940         DXUTCache_Effect &Entry = m_EffectCache[i];
00941 
00942         if( Entry.Location == DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_FILE &&
00943             !lstrcmpW( Entry.wszSource, pSrcFile ) &&
00944             Entry.dwFlags == Flags )
00945         {
00946             // A match is found.  Increment the ref coutn and return the ID3DXEffect object.
00947             *ppEffect = Entry.pEffect;
00948             (*ppEffect)->AddRef();
00949             return S_OK;
00950         }
00951     }
00952 
00953     HRESULT hr;
00954 
00955     // No matching entry.  Load the resource and create a new entry.
00956     hr = D3DXCreateEffectFromFile( pDevice, pSrcFile, pDefines, pInclude, Flags, pPool, ppEffect, ppCompilationErrors );
00957     if( FAILED( hr ) )
00958         return hr;
00959 
00960     DXUTCache_Effect NewEntry;
00961     NewEntry.Location = DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_FILE;
00962     StringCchCopy( NewEntry.wszSource, MAX_PATH, pSrcFile );
00963     NewEntry.dwFlags = Flags;
00964     NewEntry.pEffect = *ppEffect;
00965     NewEntry.pEffect->AddRef();
00966 
00967     m_EffectCache.Add( NewEntry );
00968     return S_OK;
00969 }
00970 
00971 
00972 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00973 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::CreateEffectFromResource( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, HMODULE hSrcModule, LPCTSTR pSrcResource, const D3DXMACRO *pDefines, LPD3DXINCLUDE pInclude, DWORD Flags, LPD3DXEFFECTPOOL pPool, LPD3DXEFFECT *ppEffect, LPD3DXBUFFER *ppCompilationErrors )
00974 {
00975     // Search the cache for a matching entry.
00976     for( int i = 0; i < m_EffectCache.GetSize(); ++i )
00977     {
00978         DXUTCache_Effect &Entry = m_EffectCache[i];
00979 
00980         if( Entry.Location == DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_RESOURCE &&
00981             Entry.hSrcModule == hSrcModule &&
00982             !lstrcmpW( Entry.wszSource, pSrcResource ) &&
00983             Entry.dwFlags == Flags )
00984         {
00985             // A match is found.  Increment the ref coutn and return the ID3DXEffect object.
00986             *ppEffect = Entry.pEffect;
00987             (*ppEffect)->AddRef();
00988             return S_OK;
00989         }
00990     }
00991 
00992     HRESULT hr;
00993 
00994     // No matching entry.  Load the resource and create a new entry.
00995     hr = D3DXCreateEffectFromResource( pDevice, hSrcModule, pSrcResource, pDefines, pInclude, Flags,
00996                                        pPool, ppEffect, ppCompilationErrors );
00997     if( FAILED( hr ) )
00998         return hr;
00999 
01000     DXUTCache_Effect NewEntry;
01001     NewEntry.Location = DXUTCACHE_LOCATION_RESOURCE;
01002     NewEntry.hSrcModule = hSrcModule;
01003     StringCchCopy( NewEntry.wszSource, MAX_PATH, pSrcResource );
01004     NewEntry.dwFlags = Flags;
01005     NewEntry.pEffect = *ppEffect;
01006     NewEntry.pEffect->AddRef();
01007 
01008     m_EffectCache.Add( NewEntry );
01009     return S_OK;
01010 }

01012 
01013 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01014 // Device event callbacks
01015 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01016 
01017 
01018 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01019 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::OnCreateDevice( IDirect3DDevice9 *pd3dDevice )
01020 {
01021     return S_OK;
01022 }
01023 
01024 
01025 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01026 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::OnResetDevice( IDirect3DDevice9 *pd3dDevice )
01027 {
01028     // Call OnResetDevice on all effect and font objects
01029     for( int i = 0; i < m_EffectCache.GetSize(); ++i )
01030         m_EffectCache[i].pEffect->OnResetDevice();
01031     for( int i = 0; i < m_FontCache.GetSize(); ++i )
01032         m_FontCache[i].pFont->OnResetDevice();
01033 
01034 
01035     return S_OK;
01036 }
01037 
01038 
01039 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01040 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::OnLostDevice()
01041 {
01042     // Call OnLostDevice on all effect and font objects
01043     for( int i = 0; i < m_EffectCache.GetSize(); ++i )
01044         m_EffectCache[i].pEffect->OnLostDevice();
01045     for( int i = 0; i < m_FontCache.GetSize(); ++i )
01046         m_FontCache[i].pFont->OnLostDevice();
01047 
01048     // Release all the default pool textures
01049     for( int i = m_TextureCache.GetSize() - 1; i >= 0; --i )
01050         if( m_TextureCache[i].Pool == D3DPOOL_DEFAULT )
01051         {
01052             SAFE_RELEASE( m_TextureCache[i].pTexture );
01053             m_TextureCache.Remove( i );  // Remove the entry
01054         }
01055 
01056     return S_OK;
01057 }
01058 
01059 
01060 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01061 HRESULT CDXUTResourceCache::OnDestroyDevice()
01062 {
01063     // Release all resources
01064     for( int i = m_EffectCache.GetSize() - 1; i >= 0; --i )
01065     {
01066         SAFE_RELEASE( m_EffectCache[i].pEffect );
01067         m_EffectCache.Remove( i );
01068     }
01069     for( int i = m_FontCache.GetSize() - 1; i >= 0; --i )
01070     {
01071         SAFE_RELEASE( m_FontCache[i].pFont );
01072         m_FontCache.Remove( i );
01073     }
01074     for( int i = m_TextureCache.GetSize() - 1; i >= 0; --i )
01075     {
01076         SAFE_RELEASE( m_TextureCache[i].pTexture );
01077         m_TextureCache.Remove( i );
01078     }
01079 
01080     return S_OK;
01081 }
01082 
01083 
01084 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01085 CD3DArcBall::CD3DArcBall()
01086 {
01087     Reset();
01088     m_vDownPt = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01089     m_vCurrentPt = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01090     m_Offset.x = m_Offset.y = 0;
01091 
01092     RECT rc;
01093     GetClientRect( GetForegroundWindow(), &rc );
01094     SetWindow( rc.right, rc.bottom );
01095 }
01096 
01097 
01098 
01099 
01100 
01101 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01102 void CD3DArcBall::Reset()
01103 {
01104     D3DXQuaternionIdentity( &m_qDown );
01105     D3DXQuaternionIdentity( &m_qNow );
01106     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mRotation );
01107     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mTranslation );
01108     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mTranslationDelta );
01109     m_bDrag = FALSE;
01110     m_fRadiusTranslation = 1.0f;
01111     m_fRadius = 1.0f;
01112 }
01113 
01114 
01115 
01116 
01117 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01118 D3DXVECTOR3 CD3DArcBall::ScreenToVector( float fScreenPtX, float fScreenPtY )
01119 {
01120     // Scale to screen
01121     FLOAT x   = -(fScreenPtX - m_Offset.x - m_nWidth/2)  / (m_fRadius*m_nWidth/2);
01122     FLOAT y   =  (fScreenPtY - m_Offset.y - m_nHeight/2) / (m_fRadius*m_nHeight/2);
01123 
01124     FLOAT z   = 0.0f;
01125     FLOAT mag = x*x + y*y;
01126 
01127     if( mag > 1.0f )
01128     {
01129         FLOAT scale = 1.0f/sqrtf(mag);
01130         x *= scale;
01131         y *= scale;
01132     }
01133     else
01134         z = sqrtf( 1.0f - mag );
01135 
01136     // Return vector
01137     return D3DXVECTOR3( x, y, z );
01138 }
01139 
01140 
01141 
01142 
01143 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01144 D3DXQUATERNION CD3DArcBall::QuatFromBallPoints(const D3DXVECTOR3 &vFrom, const D3DXVECTOR3 &vTo)
01145 {
01146     D3DXVECTOR3 vPart;
01147     float fDot = D3DXVec3Dot(&vFrom, &vTo);
01148     D3DXVec3Cross(&vPart, &vFrom, &vTo);
01149 
01150     return D3DXQUATERNION(vPart.x, vPart.y, vPart.z, fDot);
01151 }
01152 
01153 
01154 
01155 
01156 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01157 void CD3DArcBall::OnBegin( int nX, int nY )
01158 {
01159     // Only enter the drag state if the click falls
01160     // inside the click rectangle.
01161     if( nX >= m_Offset.x &&
01162         nX < m_Offset.x + m_nWidth &&
01163         nY >= m_Offset.y &&
01164         nY < m_Offset.y + m_nHeight )
01165     {
01166         m_bDrag = true;
01167         m_qDown = m_qNow;
01168         m_vDownPt = ScreenToVector( (float)nX, (float)nY );
01169     }
01170 }
01171 
01172 
01173 
01174 
01175 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01176 void CD3DArcBall::OnMove( int nX, int nY )
01177 {
01178     if (m_bDrag) 
01179     { 
01180         m_vCurrentPt = ScreenToVector( (float)nX, (float)nY );
01181         m_qNow = m_qDown * QuatFromBallPoints( m_vDownPt, m_vCurrentPt );
01182     }
01183 }
01184 
01185 
01186 
01187 
01188 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01189 void CD3DArcBall::OnEnd()
01190 {
01191     m_bDrag = false;
01192 }
01193 
01194 
01195 
01196 
01197 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01198 // Desc:
01199 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01200 LRESULT CD3DArcBall::HandleMessages( HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
01201 {
01202     // Current mouse position
01203     int iMouseX = (short)LOWORD(lParam);
01204     int iMouseY = (short)HIWORD(lParam);
01205 
01206     switch( uMsg )
01207     {
01208         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
01209         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
01210             SetCapture( hWnd );
01211             OnBegin( iMouseX, iMouseY );
01212             return TRUE;
01213 
01214         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
01215             ReleaseCapture();
01216             OnEnd();
01217             return TRUE;
01218 
01219         case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
01220         case WM_RBUTTONDBLCLK:
01221         case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
01222         case WM_MBUTTONDBLCLK:
01223             SetCapture( hWnd );
01224             // Store off the position of the cursor when the button is pressed
01225             m_ptLastMouse.x = iMouseX;
01226             m_ptLastMouse.y = iMouseY;
01227             return TRUE;
01228 
01229         case WM_RBUTTONUP:
01230         case WM_MBUTTONUP:
01231             ReleaseCapture();
01232             return TRUE;
01233 
01234         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
01235             if( MK_LBUTTON&wParam )
01236             {
01237                 OnMove( iMouseX, iMouseY );
01238             }
01239             else if( (MK_RBUTTON&wParam) || (MK_MBUTTON&wParam) )
01240             {
01241                 // Normalize based on size of window and bounding sphere radius
01242                 FLOAT fDeltaX = ( m_ptLastMouse.x-iMouseX ) * m_fRadiusTranslation / m_nWidth;
01243                 FLOAT fDeltaY = ( m_ptLastMouse.y-iMouseY ) * m_fRadiusTranslation / m_nHeight;
01244 
01245                 if( wParam & MK_RBUTTON )
01246                 {
01247                     D3DXMatrixTranslation( &m_mTranslationDelta, -2*fDeltaX, 2*fDeltaY, 0.0f );
01248                     D3DXMatrixMultiply( &m_mTranslation, &m_mTranslation, &m_mTranslationDelta );
01249                 }
01250                 else  // wParam & MK_MBUTTON
01251                 {
01252                     D3DXMatrixTranslation( &m_mTranslationDelta, 0.0f, 0.0f, 5*fDeltaY );
01253                     D3DXMatrixMultiply( &m_mTranslation, &m_mTranslation, &m_mTranslationDelta );
01254                 }
01255 
01256                 // Store mouse coordinate
01257                 m_ptLastMouse.x = iMouseX;
01258                 m_ptLastMouse.y = iMouseY;
01259             }
01260             return TRUE;
01261     }
01262 
01263     return FALSE;
01264 }
01265 
01266 
01267 
01268 
01269 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01270 // Constructor
01271 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01272 CBaseCamera::CBaseCamera()
01273 {
01274     m_cKeysDown = 0;
01275     ZeroMemory( m_aKeys, sizeof(BYTE)*CAM_MAX_KEYS );
01276 
01277     // Set attributes for the view matrix
01278     D3DXVECTOR3 vEyePt    = D3DXVECTOR3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
01279     D3DXVECTOR3 vLookatPt = D3DXVECTOR3(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f);
01280 
01281     // Setup the view matrix
01282     SetViewParams( &vEyePt, &vLookatPt );
01283 
01284     // Setup the projection matrix
01285     SetProjParams( D3DX_PI/4, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1000.0f );
01286 
01287     GetCursorPos( &m_ptLastMousePosition );
01288     m_bMouseLButtonDown = false;
01289     m_bMouseMButtonDown = false;
01290     m_bMouseRButtonDown = false;
01291     m_nCurrentButtonMask = 0;
01292     m_nMouseWheelDelta = 0;
01293 
01294     m_fCameraYawAngle = 0.0f;
01295     m_fCameraPitchAngle = 0.0f;
01296 
01297     SetRect( &m_rcDrag, LONG_MIN, LONG_MIN, LONG_MAX, LONG_MAX );
01298     m_vVelocity     = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01299     m_bMovementDrag = false;
01300     m_vVelocityDrag = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01301     m_fDragTimer    = 0.0f;
01302     m_fTotalDragTimeToZero = 0.25;
01303     m_vRotVelocity = D3DXVECTOR2(0,0);
01304 
01305     m_fRotationScaler = 0.01f;           
01306     m_fMoveScaler = 5.0f;           
01307 
01308     m_bInvertPitch = false;
01309     m_bEnableYAxisMovement = true;
01310     m_bEnablePositionMovement = true;
01311 
01312     m_vMouseDelta   = D3DXVECTOR2(0,0);
01313     m_fFramesToSmoothMouseData = 2.0f;
01314 
01315     m_bClipToBoundary = false;
01316     m_vMinBoundary = D3DXVECTOR3(-1,-1,-1);
01317     m_vMaxBoundary = D3DXVECTOR3(1,1,1);
01318 
01319     m_bResetCursorAfterMove = false;
01320 }
01321 
01322 
01323 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01324 // Client can call this to change the position and direction of camera
01325 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01326 VOID CBaseCamera::SetViewParams( D3DXVECTOR3* pvEyePt, D3DXVECTOR3* pvLookatPt )
01327 {
01328     if( NULL == pvEyePt || NULL == pvLookatPt )
01329         return;
01330 
01331     m_vDefaultEye = m_vEye = *pvEyePt;
01332     m_vDefaultLookAt = m_vLookAt = *pvLookatPt;
01333 
01334     // Calc the view matrix
01335     D3DXVECTOR3 vUp(0,1,0);
01336     D3DXMatrixLookAtLH( &m_mView, pvEyePt, pvLookatPt, &vUp );
01337 
01338     D3DXMATRIX mInvView;
01339     D3DXMatrixInverse( &mInvView, NULL, &m_mView );
01340 
01341     // The axis basis vectors and camera position are stored inside the 
01342     // position matrix in the 4 rows of the camera's world matrix.
01343     // To figure out the yaw/pitch of the camera, we just need the Z basis vector
01344     D3DXVECTOR3* pZBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &mInvView._31;
01345 
01346     m_fCameraYawAngle   = atan2f( pZBasis->x, pZBasis->z );
01347     float fLen = sqrtf(pZBasis->z*pZBasis->z + pZBasis->x*pZBasis->x);
01348     m_fCameraPitchAngle = -atan2f( pZBasis->y, fLen );
01349 }
01350 
01351 
01352 
01353 
01354 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01355 // Calculates the projection matrix based on input params
01356 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01357 VOID CBaseCamera::SetProjParams( FLOAT fFOV, FLOAT fAspect, FLOAT fNearPlane,
01358                                    FLOAT fFarPlane )
01359 {
01360     // Set attributes for the projection matrix
01361     m_fFOV        = fFOV;
01362     m_fAspect     = fAspect;
01363     m_fNearPlane  = fNearPlane;
01364     m_fFarPlane   = fFarPlane;
01365 
01366     D3DXMatrixPerspectiveFovLH( &m_mProj, fFOV, fAspect, fNearPlane, fFarPlane );
01367 }
01368 
01369 
01370 
01371 
01372 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01373 // Call this from your message proc so this class can handle window messages
01374 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01375 LRESULT CBaseCamera::HandleMessages( HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
01376 {
01377     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER( hWnd );
01378     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER( lParam );
01379 
01380     switch( uMsg )
01381     {
01382         case WM_KEYDOWN:
01383         {
01384             // Map this key to a D3DUtil_CameraKeys enum and update the
01385             // state of m_aKeys[] by adding the KEY_WAS_DOWN_MASK|KEY_IS_DOWN_MASK mask
01386             // only if the key is not down
01387             D3DUtil_CameraKeys mappedKey = MapKey( (UINT)wParam );
01388             if( mappedKey != CAM_UNKNOWN )
01389             {
01390                 if( FALSE == IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[mappedKey]) )
01391                 {
01392                     m_aKeys[ mappedKey ] = KEY_WAS_DOWN_MASK | KEY_IS_DOWN_MASK;
01393                     ++m_cKeysDown;
01394                 }
01395             }
01396             break;
01397         }
01398 
01399         case WM_KEYUP:
01400         {
01401             // Map this key to a D3DUtil_CameraKeys enum and update the
01402             // state of m_aKeys[] by removing the KEY_IS_DOWN_MASK mask.
01403             D3DUtil_CameraKeys mappedKey = MapKey( (UINT)wParam );
01404             if( mappedKey != CAM_UNKNOWN && (DWORD)mappedKey < 8 )
01405             {
01406                 m_aKeys[ mappedKey ] &= ~KEY_IS_DOWN_MASK;
01407                 --m_cKeysDown;
01408             }
01409             break;
01410         }
01411 
01412         case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
01413         case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
01414         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
01415         case WM_RBUTTONDBLCLK:
01416         case WM_MBUTTONDBLCLK:
01417         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
01418         {
01419             // Compute the drag rectangle in screen coord.
01420             POINT ptCursor = { (short)LOWORD(lParam), (short)HIWORD(lParam) };
01421 
01422             // Update member var state
01423             if( ( uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK ) && PtInRect( &m_rcDrag, ptCursor ) )
01424                 { m_bMouseLButtonDown = true; m_nCurrentButtonMask |= MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON; }
01425             if( ( uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDBLCLK ) && PtInRect( &m_rcDrag, ptCursor ) )
01426                 { m_bMouseMButtonDown = true; m_nCurrentButtonMask |= MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON; }
01427             if( ( uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDBLCLK ) && PtInRect( &m_rcDrag, ptCursor ) )
01428                 { m_bMouseRButtonDown = true; m_nCurrentButtonMask |= MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON; }
01429 
01430             // Capture the mouse, so if the mouse button is 
01431             // released outside the window, we'll get the WM_LBUTTONUP message
01432             SetCapture(hWnd);
01433             GetCursorPos( &m_ptLastMousePosition );
01434             return TRUE;
01435         }
01436 
01437         case WM_RBUTTONUP: 
01438         case WM_MBUTTONUP: 
01439         case WM_LBUTTONUP:   
01440         {
01441             // Update member var state
01442             if( uMsg == WM_LBUTTONUP ) { m_bMouseLButtonDown = false; m_nCurrentButtonMask &= ~MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON; }
01443             if( uMsg == WM_MBUTTONUP ) { m_bMouseMButtonDown = false; m_nCurrentButtonMask &= ~MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON; }
01444             if( uMsg == WM_RBUTTONUP ) { m_bMouseRButtonDown = false; m_nCurrentButtonMask &= ~MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON; }
01445 
01446             // Release the capture if no mouse buttons down
01447             if( !m_bMouseLButtonDown  && 
01448                 !m_bMouseRButtonDown &&
01449                 !m_bMouseMButtonDown )
01450             {
01451                 ReleaseCapture();
01452             }
01453             break;
01454         }
01455 
01456         case WM_MOUSEWHEEL: 
01457             // Update member var state
01458             m_nMouseWheelDelta = (short)HIWORD(wParam) / 120;
01459             break;
01460     }
01461 
01462     return FALSE;
01463 }
01464 
01465 
01466 
01467 
01468 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01469 // Figure out the mouse delta based on mouse movement
01470 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01471 void CBaseCamera::UpdateMouseDelta( float fElapsedTime )
01472 {
01473     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER( fElapsedTime );
01474 
01475     POINT ptCurMouseDelta;
01476     POINT ptCurMousePos;
01477     
01478     // Get current position of mouse
01479     GetCursorPos( &ptCurMousePos );
01480 
01481     // Calc how far it's moved since last frame
01482     ptCurMouseDelta.x = ptCurMousePos.x - m_ptLastMousePosition.x;
01483     ptCurMouseDelta.y = ptCurMousePos.y - m_ptLastMousePosition.y;
01484 
01485     // Record current position for next time
01486     m_ptLastMousePosition = ptCurMousePos;
01487 
01488     if( m_bResetCursorAfterMove && DXUTIsActive() )
01489     {
01490         // Set position of camera to center of desktop, 
01491         // so it always has room to move.  This is very useful
01492         // if the cursor is hidden.  If this isn't done and cursor is hidden, 
01493         // then invisible cursor will hit the edge of the screen 
01494         // and the user can't tell what happened
01495         POINT ptCenter;
01496         RECT rcDesktop;
01497         GetWindowRect( GetDesktopWindow(), &rcDesktop );
01498         ptCenter.x = (rcDesktop.right - rcDesktop.left) / 2;
01499         ptCenter.y = (rcDesktop.bottom - rcDesktop.top) / 2;   
01500         SetCursorPos( ptCenter.x, ptCenter.y );
01501         m_ptLastMousePosition = ptCenter;
01502     }
01503 
01504     // Smooth the relative mouse data over a few frames so it isn't 
01505     // jerky when moving slowly at low frame rates.
01506     float fPercentOfNew =  1.0f / m_fFramesToSmoothMouseData;
01507     float fPercentOfOld =  1.0f - fPercentOfNew;
01508     m_vMouseDelta.x = m_vMouseDelta.x*fPercentOfOld + ptCurMouseDelta.x*fPercentOfNew;
01509     m_vMouseDelta.y = m_vMouseDelta.y*fPercentOfOld + ptCurMouseDelta.y*fPercentOfNew;
01510 
01511     m_vRotVelocity = m_vMouseDelta * m_fRotationScaler;
01512 }
01513 
01514 
01515 
01516 
01517 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01518 // Figure out the velocity based on keyboard input & drag if any
01519 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01520 void CBaseCamera::UpdateVelocity( float fElapsedTime )
01521 {
01522     D3DXMATRIX mRotDelta;
01523     D3DXVECTOR3 vAccel = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01524 
01525     if( m_bEnablePositionMovement )
01526     {
01527         // Update acceleration vector based on keyboard state
01528         if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_MOVE_FORWARD]) )
01529             vAccel.z += 1.0f;
01530         if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_MOVE_BACKWARD]) )
01531             vAccel.z -= 1.0f;
01532         if( m_bEnableYAxisMovement )
01533         {
01534             if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_MOVE_UP]) )
01535                 vAccel.y += 1.0f;
01536             if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_MOVE_DOWN]) )
01537                 vAccel.y -= 1.0f;
01538         }
01539         if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_STRAFE_RIGHT]) )
01540             vAccel.x += 1.0f;
01541         if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_STRAFE_LEFT]) )
01542             vAccel.x -= 1.0f;
01543     }
01544 
01545     // Normalize vector so if moving 2 dirs (left & forward), 
01546     // the camera doesn't move faster than if moving in 1 dir
01547     D3DXVec3Normalize( &vAccel, &vAccel );
01548 
01549     // Scale the acceleration vector
01550     vAccel *= m_fMoveScaler;
01551 
01552     if( m_bMovementDrag )
01553     {
01554         // Is there any acceleration this frame?
01555         if( D3DXVec3LengthSq( &vAccel ) > 0 )
01556         {
01557             // If so, then this means the user has pressed a movement key\
01558             // so change the velocity immediately to acceleration 
01559             // upon keyboard input.  This isn't normal physics
01560             // but it will give a quick response to keyboard input
01561             m_vVelocity = vAccel;
01562             m_fDragTimer = m_fTotalDragTimeToZero;
01563             m_vVelocityDrag = vAccel / m_fDragTimer;
01564         }
01565         else 
01566         {
01567             // If no key being pressed, then slowly decrease velocity to 0
01568             if( m_fDragTimer > 0 )
01569             {
01570                 // Drag until timer is <= 0
01571                 m_vVelocity -= m_vVelocityDrag * fElapsedTime;
01572                 m_fDragTimer -= fElapsedTime;
01573             }
01574             else
01575             {
01576                 // Zero velocity
01577                 m_vVelocity = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01578             }
01579         }
01580     }
01581     else
01582     {
01583         // No drag, so immediately change the velocity
01584         m_vVelocity = vAccel;
01585     }
01586 }
01587 
01588 
01589 
01590 
01591 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01592 // Clamps pV to lie inside m_vMinBoundary & m_vMaxBoundary
01593 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01594 void CBaseCamera::ConstrainToBoundary( D3DXVECTOR3* pV )
01595 {
01596     // Constrain vector to a bounding box 
01597     pV->x = __max(pV->x, m_vMinBoundary.x);
01598     pV->y = __max(pV->y, m_vMinBoundary.y);
01599     pV->z = __max(pV->z, m_vMinBoundary.z);
01600 
01601     pV->x = __min(pV->x, m_vMaxBoundary.x);
01602     pV->y = __min(pV->y, m_vMaxBoundary.y);
01603     pV->z = __min(pV->z, m_vMaxBoundary.z);
01604 }
01605 
01606 
01607 
01608 
01609 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01610 // Maps a windows virtual key to an enum
01611 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01612 D3DUtil_CameraKeys CBaseCamera::MapKey( UINT nKey )
01613 {
01614     // This could be upgraded to a method that's user-definable but for 
01615     // simplicity, we'll use a hardcoded mapping.
01616     switch( nKey )
01617     {
01618         case VK_CONTROL:  return CAM_CONTROLDOWN;
01619         case VK_LEFT:  return CAM_STRAFE_LEFT;
01620         case VK_RIGHT: return CAM_STRAFE_RIGHT;
01621         case VK_UP:    return CAM_MOVE_FORWARD;
01622         case VK_DOWN:  return CAM_MOVE_BACKWARD;
01623         case VK_PRIOR: return CAM_MOVE_UP;        // pgup
01624         case VK_NEXT:  return CAM_MOVE_DOWN;      // pgdn
01625 
01626         case 'A':      return CAM_STRAFE_LEFT;
01627         case 'D':      return CAM_STRAFE_RIGHT;
01628         case 'W':      return CAM_MOVE_FORWARD;
01629         case 'S':      return CAM_MOVE_BACKWARD;
01630         case 'Q':      return CAM_MOVE_DOWN;
01631         case 'E':      return CAM_MOVE_UP;
01632 
01633         case VK_NUMPAD4: return CAM_STRAFE_LEFT;
01634         case VK_NUMPAD6: return CAM_STRAFE_RIGHT;
01635         case VK_NUMPAD8: return CAM_MOVE_FORWARD;
01636         case VK_NUMPAD2: return CAM_MOVE_BACKWARD;
01637         case VK_NUMPAD9: return CAM_MOVE_UP;        
01638         case VK_NUMPAD3: return CAM_MOVE_DOWN;      
01639 
01640         case VK_HOME:   return CAM_RESET;
01641     }
01642 
01643     return CAM_UNKNOWN;
01644 }
01645 
01646 
01647 
01648 
01649 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01650 // Reset the camera's position back to the default
01651 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01652 VOID CBaseCamera::Reset()
01653 {
01654     SetViewParams( &m_vDefaultEye, &m_vDefaultLookAt );
01655 }
01656 
01657 
01658 
01659 
01660 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01661 // Constructor
01662 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01663 CFirstPersonCamera::CFirstPersonCamera() :
01664     m_nActiveButtonMask( 0x07 )
01665 {
01666         m_bRotateWithoutButtonDown = false;
01667 }
01668 
01669 
01670 
01671 
01672 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01673 // Update the view matrix based on user input & elapsed time
01674 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01675 VOID CFirstPersonCamera::FrameMove( FLOAT fElapsedTime )
01676 {
01677     if( DXUTGetGlobalTimer()->IsStopped() )
01678         fElapsedTime = 1.0f / DXUTGetFPS();
01679 
01680     if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_RESET]) )
01681         Reset();
01682 
01683     // Get the mouse movement (if any) if the mouse button are down
01684     if( (m_nActiveButtonMask & m_nCurrentButtonMask) || m_bRotateWithoutButtonDown )
01685         UpdateMouseDelta( fElapsedTime );
01686 
01687     // Get amount of velocity based on the keyboard input and drag (if any)
01688     UpdateVelocity( fElapsedTime );
01689 
01690     // Simple euler method to calculate position delta
01691     D3DXVECTOR3 vPosDelta = m_vVelocity * fElapsedTime;
01692 
01693     // If rotating the camera 
01694     if( (m_nActiveButtonMask & m_nCurrentButtonMask) || m_bRotateWithoutButtonDown )
01695     {
01696         // Update the pitch & yaw angle based on mouse movement
01697         float fYawDelta   = m_vRotVelocity.x;
01698         float fPitchDelta = m_vRotVelocity.y;
01699 
01700         // Invert pitch if requested
01701         if( m_bInvertPitch )
01702             fPitchDelta = -fPitchDelta;
01703 
01704         m_fCameraPitchAngle += fPitchDelta;
01705         m_fCameraYawAngle   += fYawDelta;
01706 
01707         // Limit pitch to straight up or straight down
01708         m_fCameraPitchAngle = __max( -D3DX_PI/2.0f,  m_fCameraPitchAngle );
01709         m_fCameraPitchAngle = __min( +D3DX_PI/2.0f,  m_fCameraPitchAngle );
01710     }
01711 
01712     // Make a rotation matrix based on the camera's yaw & pitch
01713     D3DXMATRIX mCameraRot;
01714     D3DXMatrixRotationYawPitchRoll( &mCameraRot, m_fCameraYawAngle, m_fCameraPitchAngle, 0 );
01715 
01716     // Transform vectors based on camera's rotation matrix
01717     D3DXVECTOR3 vWorldUp, vWorldAhead;
01718     D3DXVECTOR3 vLocalUp    = D3DXVECTOR3(0,1,0);
01719     D3DXVECTOR3 vLocalAhead = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,1);
01720     D3DXVec3TransformCoord( &vWorldUp, &vLocalUp, &mCameraRot );
01721     D3DXVec3TransformCoord( &vWorldAhead, &vLocalAhead, &mCameraRot );
01722 
01723     // Transform the position delta by the camera's rotation 
01724     D3DXVECTOR3 vPosDeltaWorld;
01725     if( !m_bEnableYAxisMovement )
01726     {
01727         // If restricting Y movement, do not include pitch
01728         // when transforming position delta vector.
01729         D3DXMatrixRotationYawPitchRoll( &mCameraRot, m_fCameraYawAngle, 0.0f, 0.0f );
01730     }
01731     D3DXVec3TransformCoord( &vPosDeltaWorld, &vPosDelta, &mCameraRot );
01732 
01733     // Move the eye position 
01734     m_vEye += vPosDeltaWorld;
01735     if( m_bClipToBoundary )
01736         ConstrainToBoundary( &m_vEye );
01737 
01738     // Update the lookAt position based on the eye position 
01739     m_vLookAt = m_vEye + vWorldAhead;
01740 
01741     // Update the view matrix
01742     D3DXMatrixLookAtLH( &m_mView, &m_vEye, &m_vLookAt, &vWorldUp );
01743 
01744     D3DXMatrixInverse( &m_mCameraWorld, NULL, &m_mView );
01745 }
01746 
01747 
01748 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01749 // Enable or disable each of the mouse buttons for rotation drag.
01750 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01751 void CFirstPersonCamera::SetRotateButtons( bool bLeft, bool bMiddle, bool bRight, bool bRotateWithoutButtonDown )
01752 {
01753     m_nActiveButtonMask = ( bLeft ? MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON : 0 ) |
01754                           ( bMiddle ? MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON : 0 ) |
01755                           ( bRight ? MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON : 0 );
01756         m_bRotateWithoutButtonDown = bRotateWithoutButtonDown;
01757 }
01758 
01759 
01760 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01761 // Constructor 
01762 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01763 CModelViewerCamera::CModelViewerCamera()
01764 {
01765     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mWorld );
01766     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mModelRot );
01767     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mModelLastRot );    
01768     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mCameraRotLast );    
01769     m_vModelCenter = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
01770     m_fRadius    = 5.0f;
01771     m_fDefaultRadius = 5.0f;
01772     m_fMinRadius = 1.0f;
01773     m_fMaxRadius = FLT_MAX;
01774     m_bLimitPitch = false;
01775     m_bEnablePositionMovement = false;
01776     m_bAttachCameraToModel = false;
01777 
01778     m_nRotateModelButtonMask  = MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON;
01779     m_nZoomButtonMask         = MOUSE_WHEEL;
01780     m_nRotateCameraButtonMask = MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON;
01781     m_bDragSinceLastUpdate    = true;
01782 }
01783 
01784 
01785 
01786 
01787 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01788 // Update the view matrix & the model's world matrix based 
01789 //       on user input & elapsed time
01790 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01791 VOID CModelViewerCamera::FrameMove( FLOAT fElapsedTime )
01792 {
01793     if( IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_RESET]) )
01794         Reset();
01795 
01796     // If no dragged has happend since last time FrameMove is called,
01797     // and no camera key is held down, then no need to handle again.
01798     if( !m_bDragSinceLastUpdate && 0 == m_cKeysDown )
01799         return;
01800     m_bDragSinceLastUpdate = false;
01801 
01802     // If no mouse button is held down, 
01803     // Get the mouse movement (if any) if the mouse button are down
01804     if( m_nCurrentButtonMask != 0 ) 
01805         UpdateMouseDelta( fElapsedTime );
01806 
01807     // Get amount of velocity based on the keyboard input and drag (if any)
01808     UpdateVelocity( fElapsedTime );
01809 
01810     // Simple euler method to calculate position delta
01811     D3DXVECTOR3 vPosDelta = m_vVelocity * fElapsedTime;
01812 
01813     // Change the radius from the camera to the model based on wheel scrolling
01814     if( m_nMouseWheelDelta && m_nZoomButtonMask == MOUSE_WHEEL )
01815         m_fRadius -= m_nMouseWheelDelta * m_fRadius * 0.1f;
01816     m_fRadius = __min( m_fMaxRadius, m_fRadius );
01817     m_fRadius = __max( m_fMinRadius, m_fRadius );
01818     m_nMouseWheelDelta = 0;
01819 
01820     // Get the inverse of the arcball's rotation matrix
01821     D3DXMATRIX mCameraRot;
01822     D3DXMatrixInverse( &mCameraRot, NULL, m_ViewArcBall.GetRotationMatrix() );
01823 
01824     // Transform vectors based on camera's rotation matrix
01825     D3DXVECTOR3 vWorldUp, vWorldAhead;
01826     D3DXVECTOR3 vLocalUp    = D3DXVECTOR3(0,1,0);
01827     D3DXVECTOR3 vLocalAhead = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,1);
01828     D3DXVec3TransformCoord( &vWorldUp, &vLocalUp, &mCameraRot );
01829     D3DXVec3TransformCoord( &vWorldAhead, &vLocalAhead, &mCameraRot );
01830 
01831     // Transform the position delta by the camera's rotation 
01832     D3DXVECTOR3 vPosDeltaWorld;
01833     D3DXVec3TransformCoord( &vPosDeltaWorld, &vPosDelta, &mCameraRot );
01834 
01835     // Move the lookAt position 
01836     m_vLookAt += vPosDeltaWorld;
01837     if( m_bClipToBoundary )
01838         ConstrainToBoundary( &m_vLookAt );
01839 
01840     // Update the eye point based on a radius away from the lookAt position
01841     m_vEye = m_vLookAt - vWorldAhead * m_fRadius;
01842 
01843     // Update the view matrix
01844     D3DXMatrixLookAtLH( &m_mView, &m_vEye, &m_vLookAt, &vWorldUp );
01845 
01846     D3DXMATRIX mInvView;
01847     D3DXMatrixInverse( &mInvView, NULL, &m_mView );
01848     mInvView._41 = mInvView._42 = mInvView._43 = 0;
01849 
01850     D3DXMATRIX mModelLastRotInv;
01851     D3DXMatrixInverse(&mModelLastRotInv, NULL, &m_mModelLastRot);
01852 
01853     // Accumulate the delta of the arcball's rotation in view space.
01854     // Note that per-frame delta rotations could be problematic over long periods of time.
01855     D3DXMATRIX mModelRot;
01856     mModelRot = *m_WorldArcBall.GetRotationMatrix();
01857     m_mModelRot *= m_mView * mModelLastRotInv * mModelRot * mInvView;
01858 
01859     if( m_ViewArcBall.IsBeingDragged() && m_bAttachCameraToModel && !IsKeyDown(m_aKeys[CAM_CONTROLDOWN]) )
01860     {
01861         // Attach camera to model by inverse of the model rotation
01862         D3DXMATRIX mCameraLastRotInv;
01863         D3DXMatrixInverse(&mCameraLastRotInv, NULL, &m_mCameraRotLast);
01864         D3DXMATRIX mCameraRotDelta = mCameraLastRotInv * mCameraRot; // local to world matrix
01865         m_mModelRot *= mCameraRotDelta;
01866     }
01867     m_mCameraRotLast = mCameraRot; 
01868 
01869     m_mModelLastRot = mModelRot;
01870 
01871     // Since we're accumulating delta rotations, we need to orthonormalize 
01872     // the matrix to prevent eventual matrix skew
01873     D3DXVECTOR3* pXBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &m_mModelRot._11;
01874     D3DXVECTOR3* pYBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &m_mModelRot._21;
01875     D3DXVECTOR3* pZBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &m_mModelRot._31;
01876     D3DXVec3Normalize( pXBasis, pXBasis );
01877     D3DXVec3Cross( pYBasis, pZBasis, pXBasis );
01878     D3DXVec3Normalize( pYBasis, pYBasis );
01879     D3DXVec3Cross( pZBasis, pXBasis, pYBasis );
01880 
01881     // Translate the rotation matrix to the same position as the lookAt position
01882     m_mModelRot._41 = m_vLookAt.x;
01883     m_mModelRot._42 = m_vLookAt.y;
01884     m_mModelRot._43 = m_vLookAt.z;
01885 
01886     // Translate world matrix so its at the center of the model
01887     D3DXMATRIX mTrans;
01888     D3DXMatrixTranslation( &mTrans, -m_vModelCenter.x, -m_vModelCenter.y, -m_vModelCenter.z );
01889     m_mWorld = mTrans * m_mModelRot;
01890 }
01891 
01892 
01893 void CModelViewerCamera::SetDragRect( RECT &rc )
01894 {
01895     CBaseCamera::SetDragRect( rc );
01896 
01897     m_WorldArcBall.SetOffset( rc.left, rc.top );
01898     m_ViewArcBall.SetOffset( rc.left, rc.top );
01899     SetWindow( rc.right - rc.left, rc.bottom - rc.top );
01900 }
01901 
01902 
01903 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01904 // Reset the camera's position back to the default
01905 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01906 VOID CModelViewerCamera::Reset()
01907 {
01908     CBaseCamera::Reset();
01909 
01910     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mWorld );
01911     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mModelRot );
01912     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mModelLastRot );    
01913     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mCameraRotLast );    
01914 
01915     m_fRadius = m_fDefaultRadius;
01916     m_WorldArcBall.Reset();
01917     m_ViewArcBall.Reset();
01918 }
01919 
01920 
01921 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01922 // Override for setting the view parameters
01923 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01924 void CModelViewerCamera::SetViewParams( D3DXVECTOR3* pvEyePt, D3DXVECTOR3* pvLookatPt )
01925 {
01926     CBaseCamera::SetViewParams( pvEyePt, pvLookatPt );
01927 
01928     // Propogate changes to the member arcball
01929     D3DXQUATERNION quat;
01930     D3DXMATRIXA16 mRotation;
01931     D3DXVECTOR3 vUp(0,1,0);
01932     D3DXMatrixLookAtLH( &mRotation, pvEyePt, pvLookatPt, &vUp );
01933     D3DXQuaternionRotationMatrix( &quat, &mRotation );
01934     m_ViewArcBall.SetQuatNow( quat );
01935 
01936     // Set the radius according to the distance
01937     D3DXVECTOR3 vEyeToPoint;
01938     D3DXVec3Subtract( &vEyeToPoint, pvLookatPt, pvEyePt );
01939     SetRadius( D3DXVec3Length( &vEyeToPoint ) );
01940 
01941     // View information changed. FrameMove should be called.
01942     m_bDragSinceLastUpdate = true;
01943 }
01944 
01945 
01946 
01947 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01948 // Call this from your message proc so this class can handle window messages
01949 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01950 LRESULT CModelViewerCamera::HandleMessages( HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
01951 {
01952     CBaseCamera::HandleMessages( hWnd, uMsg, wParam, lParam );
01953 
01954     if( ( (uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK ) && m_nRotateModelButtonMask & MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) ||
01955         ( (uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDBLCLK ) && m_nRotateModelButtonMask & MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON) ||
01956         ( (uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDBLCLK ) && m_nRotateModelButtonMask & MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON) )
01957     {
01958         int iMouseX = (short)LOWORD(lParam);
01959         int iMouseY = (short)HIWORD(lParam);
01960         m_WorldArcBall.OnBegin( iMouseX, iMouseY );
01961     }
01962 
01963     if( ( (uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK ) && m_nRotateCameraButtonMask & MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) ||
01964         ( (uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDBLCLK ) && m_nRotateCameraButtonMask & MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON) ||
01965         ( (uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDOWN || uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDBLCLK ) && m_nRotateCameraButtonMask & MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON) )
01966     {
01967         int iMouseX = (short)LOWORD(lParam);
01968         int iMouseY = (short)HIWORD(lParam);
01969         m_ViewArcBall.OnBegin( iMouseX, iMouseY );
01970     }
01971 
01972     if( uMsg == WM_MOUSEMOVE )
01973     {
01974         int iMouseX = (short)LOWORD(lParam);
01975         int iMouseY = (short)HIWORD(lParam);
01976         m_WorldArcBall.OnMove( iMouseX, iMouseY );
01977         m_ViewArcBall.OnMove( iMouseX, iMouseY );
01978     }
01979 
01980     if( (uMsg == WM_LBUTTONUP && m_nRotateModelButtonMask & MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) ||
01981         (uMsg == WM_MBUTTONUP && m_nRotateModelButtonMask & MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON) ||
01982         (uMsg == WM_RBUTTONUP && m_nRotateModelButtonMask & MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON) )
01983     {
01984         m_WorldArcBall.OnEnd();
01985     }
01986 
01987     if( (uMsg == WM_LBUTTONUP && m_nRotateCameraButtonMask & MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) ||
01988         (uMsg == WM_MBUTTONUP && m_nRotateCameraButtonMask & MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON) ||
01989         (uMsg == WM_RBUTTONUP && m_nRotateCameraButtonMask & MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON) )
01990     {
01991         m_ViewArcBall.OnEnd();
01992     }
01993 
01994     if( uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN ||
01995         uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK ||
01996         uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDOWN ||
01997         uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDBLCLK ||
01998         uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDOWN ||
01999         uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDBLCLK ||
02000         uMsg == WM_LBUTTONUP ||
02001         uMsg == WM_MBUTTONUP ||
02002         uMsg == WM_RBUTTONUP ||
02003         uMsg == WM_MOUSEWHEEL ||
02004         uMsg == WM_MOUSEMOVE )
02005     {
02006         m_bDragSinceLastUpdate = true;
02007     }
02008 
02009     return FALSE;
02010 }

02013 
02014 
02015 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02016 // Desc: Returns a view matrix for rendering to a face of a cubemap.
02017 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02018 D3DXMATRIX DXUTGetCubeMapViewMatrix( DWORD dwFace )
02019 {
02020     D3DXVECTOR3 vEyePt   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
02021     D3DXVECTOR3 vLookDir;
02022     D3DXVECTOR3 vUpDir;
02023 
02024     switch( dwFace )
02025     {
02026         case D3DCUBEMAP_FACE_POSITIVE_X:
02027             vLookDir = D3DXVECTOR3( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
02028             vUpDir   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
02029             break;
02030         case D3DCUBEMAP_FACE_NEGATIVE_X:
02031             vLookDir = D3DXVECTOR3(-1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
02032             vUpDir   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
02033             break;
02034         case D3DCUBEMAP_FACE_POSITIVE_Y:
02035             vLookDir = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
02036             vUpDir   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f,-1.0f );
02037             break;
02038         case D3DCUBEMAP_FACE_NEGATIVE_Y:
02039             vLookDir = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f,-1.0f, 0.0f );
02040             vUpDir   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
02041             break;
02042         case D3DCUBEMAP_FACE_POSITIVE_Z:
02043             vLookDir = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
02044             vUpDir   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
02045             break;
02046         case D3DCUBEMAP_FACE_NEGATIVE_Z:
02047             vLookDir = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f,-1.0f );
02048             vUpDir   = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
02049             break;
02050     }
02051 
02052     // Set the view transform for this cubemap surface
02053     D3DXMATRIXA16 mView;
02054     D3DXMatrixLookAtLH( &mView, &vEyePt, &vLookDir, &vUpDir );
02055     return mView;
02056 }
02057 
02058 
02059 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02060 // Returns the string for the given D3DFORMAT.
02061 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02062 LPCWSTR DXUTD3DFormatToString( D3DFORMAT format, bool bWithPrefix )
02063 {
02064     WCHAR* pstr = NULL;
02065     switch( format )
02066     {
02067     case D3DFMT_UNKNOWN:         pstr = L"D3DFMT_UNKNOWN"; break;
02068     case D3DFMT_R8G8B8:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_R8G8B8"; break;
02069     case D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8"; break;
02070     case D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8"; break;
02071     case D3DFMT_R5G6B5:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_R5G6B5"; break;
02072     case D3DFMT_X1R5G5B5:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_X1R5G5B5"; break;
02073     case D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5"; break;
02074     case D3DFMT_A4R4G4B4:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_A4R4G4B4"; break;
02075     case D3DFMT_R3G3B2:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_R3G3B2"; break;
02076     case D3DFMT_A8:              pstr = L"D3DFMT_A8"; break;
02077     case D3DFMT_A8R3G3B2:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_A8R3G3B2"; break;
02078     case D3DFMT_X4R4G4B4:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_X4R4G4B4"; break;
02079     case D3DFMT_A2B10G10R10:     pstr = L"D3DFMT_A2B10G10R10"; break;
02080     case D3DFMT_A8B8G8R8:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_A8B8G8R8"; break;
02081     case D3DFMT_X8B8G8R8:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_X8B8G8R8"; break;
02082     case D3DFMT_G16R16:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_G16R16"; break;
02083     case D3DFMT_A2R10G10B10:     pstr = L"D3DFMT_A2R10G10B10"; break;
02084     case D3DFMT_A16B16G16R16:    pstr = L"D3DFMT_A16B16G16R16"; break;
02085     case D3DFMT_A8P8:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_A8P8"; break;
02086     case D3DFMT_P8:              pstr = L"D3DFMT_P8"; break;
02087     case D3DFMT_L8:              pstr = L"D3DFMT_L8"; break;
02088     case D3DFMT_A8L8:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_A8L8"; break;
02089     case D3DFMT_A4L4:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_A4L4"; break;
02090     case D3DFMT_V8U8:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_V8U8"; break;
02091     case D3DFMT_L6V5U5:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_L6V5U5"; break;
02092     case D3DFMT_X8L8V8U8:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_X8L8V8U8"; break;
02093     case D3DFMT_Q8W8V8U8:        pstr = L"D3DFMT_Q8W8V8U8"; break;
02094     case D3DFMT_V16U16:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_V16U16"; break;
02095     case D3DFMT_A2W10V10U10:     pstr = L"D3DFMT_A2W10V10U10"; break;
02096     case D3DFMT_UYVY:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_UYVY"; break;
02097     case D3DFMT_YUY2:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_YUY2"; break;
02098     case D3DFMT_DXT1:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_DXT1"; break;
02099     case D3DFMT_DXT2:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_DXT2"; break;
02100     case D3DFMT_DXT3:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_DXT3"; break;
02101     case D3DFMT_DXT4:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_DXT4"; break;
02102     case D3DFMT_DXT5:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_DXT5"; break;
02103     case D3DFMT_D16_LOCKABLE:    pstr = L"D3DFMT_D16_LOCKABLE"; break;
02104     case D3DFMT_D32:             pstr = L"D3DFMT_D32"; break;
02105     case D3DFMT_D15S1:           pstr = L"D3DFMT_D15S1"; break;
02106     case D3DFMT_D24S8:           pstr = L"D3DFMT_D24S8"; break;
02107     case D3DFMT_D24X8:           pstr = L"D3DFMT_D24X8"; break;
02108     case D3DFMT_D24X4S4:         pstr = L"D3DFMT_D24X4S4"; break;
02109     case D3DFMT_D16:             pstr = L"D3DFMT_D16"; break;
02110     case D3DFMT_L16:             pstr = L"D3DFMT_L16"; break;
02111     case D3DFMT_VERTEXDATA:      pstr = L"D3DFMT_VERTEXDATA"; break;
02112     case D3DFMT_INDEX16:         pstr = L"D3DFMT_INDEX16"; break;
02113     case D3DFMT_INDEX32:         pstr = L"D3DFMT_INDEX32"; break;
02114     case D3DFMT_Q16W16V16U16:    pstr = L"D3DFMT_Q16W16V16U16"; break;
02115     case D3DFMT_MULTI2_ARGB8:    pstr = L"D3DFMT_MULTI2_ARGB8"; break;
02116     case D3DFMT_R16F:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_R16F"; break;
02117     case D3DFMT_G16R16F:         pstr = L"D3DFMT_G16R16F"; break;
02118     case D3DFMT_A16B16G16R16F:   pstr = L"D3DFMT_A16B16G16R16F"; break;
02119     case D3DFMT_R32F:            pstr = L"D3DFMT_R32F"; break;
02120     case D3DFMT_G32R32F:         pstr = L"D3DFMT_G32R32F"; break;
02121     case D3DFMT_A32B32G32R32F:   pstr = L"D3DFMT_A32B32G32R32F"; break;
02122     case D3DFMT_CxV8U8:          pstr = L"D3DFMT_CxV8U8"; break;
02123     default:                     pstr = L"Unknown format"; break;
02124     }
02125     if( bWithPrefix || wcsstr( pstr, L"D3DFMT_" )== NULL )
02126         return pstr;
02127     else
02128         return pstr + lstrlen( L"D3DFMT_" );
02129 }
