02133 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02134 // Outputs to the debug stream a formatted Unicode string with a variable-argument list.
02135 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02136 VOID DXUTOutputDebugStringW( LPCWSTR strMsg, ... )
02137 {
02138 #if defined(DEBUG) | defined(_DEBUG)
02139     WCHAR strBuffer[512];
02140     
02141     va_list args;
02142     va_start(args, strMsg);
02143     StringCchVPrintfW( strBuffer, 512, strMsg, args );
02144     strBuffer[511] = L'\0';
02145     va_end(args);
02146 
02147     OutputDebugString( strBuffer );
02148 #else
02149     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER(strMsg);
02150 #endif
02151 }
02152 
02153 
02154 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02155 // Outputs to the debug stream a formatted MBCS string with a variable-argument list.
02156 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02157 VOID DXUTOutputDebugStringA( LPCSTR strMsg, ... )
02158 {
02159 #if defined(DEBUG) | defined(_DEBUG)
02160     CHAR strBuffer[512];
02161     
02162     va_list args;
02163     va_start(args, strMsg);
02164     StringCchVPrintfA( strBuffer, 512, strMsg, args );
02165     strBuffer[511] = '\0';
02166     va_end(args);
02167 
02168     OutputDebugStringA( strBuffer );
02169 #else
02170     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER(strMsg);
02171 #endif
02172 }
02173 
02174 
02175 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02176 CDXUTLineManager::CDXUTLineManager()
02177 {
02178     m_pd3dDevice = NULL;
02179     m_pD3DXLine = NULL;
02180 }
02181 
02182 
02183 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02184 CDXUTLineManager::~CDXUTLineManager()
02185 {
02186     OnDeletedDevice();
02187 }
02188 
02189 
02190 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02191 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::OnCreatedDevice( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice )
02192 {
02193     m_pd3dDevice = pd3dDevice;
02194 
02195     HRESULT hr;
02196     hr = D3DXCreateLine( m_pd3dDevice, &m_pD3DXLine );
02197     if( FAILED(hr) )
02198         return hr;
02199 
02200     return S_OK;
02201 }
02202 
02203 
02204 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02205 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::OnResetDevice()
02206 {
02207     if( m_pD3DXLine )
02208         m_pD3DXLine->OnResetDevice();
02209 
02210     return S_OK;
02211 }
02212 
02213 
02214 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02215 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::OnRender()
02216 {
02217     HRESULT hr;
02218     if( NULL == m_pD3DXLine )
02219         return E_INVALIDARG;
02220 
02221     bool bDrawingHasBegun = false;
02222     float fLastWidth = 0.0f;
02223     bool bLastAntiAlias = false;
02224     
02225     for( int i=0; i<m_LinesList.GetSize(); i++ )
02226     {
02227         LINE_NODE* pLineNode = m_LinesList.GetAt(i);
02228         if( pLineNode )
02229         {
02230             if( !bDrawingHasBegun || 
02231                 fLastWidth != pLineNode->fWidth || 
02232                 bLastAntiAlias != pLineNode->bAntiAlias )
02233             {
02234                 if( bDrawingHasBegun )
02235                 {
02236                     hr = m_pD3DXLine->End();
02237                     if( FAILED(hr) )
02238                         return hr;
02239                 }
02240 
02241                 m_pD3DXLine->SetWidth( pLineNode->fWidth );
02242                 m_pD3DXLine->SetAntialias( pLineNode->bAntiAlias );
02243 
02244                 fLastWidth = pLineNode->fWidth;
02245                 bLastAntiAlias = pLineNode->bAntiAlias;
02246 
02247                 hr = m_pD3DXLine->Begin();
02248                 if( FAILED(hr) )
02249                     return hr;
02250                 bDrawingHasBegun = true;
02251             }
02252 
02253             hr = m_pD3DXLine->Draw( pLineNode->pVertexList, pLineNode->dwVertexListCount, pLineNode->Color );
02254             if( FAILED(hr) )
02255                 return hr;
02256         }
02257     }
02258 
02259     if( bDrawingHasBegun )
02260     {
02261         hr = m_pD3DXLine->End();
02262         if( FAILED(hr) )
02263             return hr;
02264     }
02265 
02266     return S_OK;
02267 }
02268 
02269 
02270 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02271 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::OnLostDevice()
02272 {
02273     if( m_pD3DXLine )
02274         m_pD3DXLine->OnLostDevice();
02275 
02276     return S_OK;
02277 }
02278 
02279 
02280 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02281 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::OnDeletedDevice()
02282 {
02283     RemoveAllLines();
02284     SAFE_RELEASE( m_pD3DXLine );
02285 
02286     return S_OK;
02287 }
02288 
02289 
02290 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02291 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::AddLine( int* pnLineID, D3DXVECTOR2* pVertexList, DWORD dwVertexListCount, D3DCOLOR Color, float fWidth, float fScaleRatio, bool bAntiAlias )
02292 {
02293     if( pVertexList == NULL || dwVertexListCount == 0 )
02294         return E_INVALIDARG;
02295 
02296     LINE_NODE* pLineNode = new LINE_NODE;
02297     if( pLineNode == NULL )
02298         return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
02299     ZeroMemory( pLineNode, sizeof(LINE_NODE) );
02300 
02301     pLineNode->nLineID = m_LinesList.GetSize();
02302     pLineNode->Color = Color;
02303     pLineNode->fWidth = fWidth;
02304     pLineNode->bAntiAlias = bAntiAlias;
02305     pLineNode->dwVertexListCount = dwVertexListCount;
02306 
02307     if( pnLineID )
02308         *pnLineID = pLineNode->nLineID;
02309 
02310     pLineNode->pVertexList = DX_NEW D3DXVECTOR2[dwVertexListCount];
02311     if( pLineNode->pVertexList == NULL )
02312     {
02313         delete pLineNode;
02314         return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
02315     }
02316     for( DWORD i=0; i<dwVertexListCount; i++ )
02317     {
02318         pLineNode->pVertexList[i] = pVertexList[i] * fScaleRatio;
02319     }
02320 
02321     m_LinesList.Add( pLineNode );
02322 
02323     return S_OK;
02324 }
02325 
02326 
02327 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02328 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::AddRect( int* pnLineID, RECT rc, D3DCOLOR Color, float fWidth, float fScaleRatio, bool bAntiAlias )
02329 {
02330     if( fWidth > 2.0f )
02331     {
02332         D3DXVECTOR2 vertexList[8];
02333 
02334         vertexList[0].x = (float)rc.left;
02335         vertexList[0].y = (float)rc.top - (fWidth/2.0f);
02336 
02337         vertexList[1].x = (float)rc.left;
02338         vertexList[1].y = (float)rc.bottom + (fWidth/2.0f);
02339 
02340         vertexList[2].x = (float)rc.left;
02341         vertexList[2].y = (float)rc.bottom - 0.5f;
02342 
02343         vertexList[3].x = (float)rc.right;
02344         vertexList[3].y = (float)rc.bottom - 0.5f;
02345 
02346         vertexList[4].x = (float)rc.right;
02347         vertexList[4].y = (float)rc.bottom + (fWidth/2.0f);
02348 
02349         vertexList[5].x = (float)rc.right;
02350         vertexList[5].y = (float)rc.top - (fWidth/2.0f);
02351 
02352         vertexList[6].x = (float)rc.right;
02353         vertexList[6].y = (float)rc.top;
02354 
02355         vertexList[7].x = (float)rc.left;
02356         vertexList[7].y = (float)rc.top;
02357         
02358         return AddLine( pnLineID, vertexList, 8, Color, fWidth, fScaleRatio, bAntiAlias );
02359     }
02360     else
02361     {
02362         D3DXVECTOR2 vertexList[5];
02363         vertexList[0].x = (float)rc.left;
02364         vertexList[0].y = (float)rc.top;
02365 
02366         vertexList[1].x = (float)rc.left;
02367         vertexList[1].y = (float)rc.bottom;
02368 
02369         vertexList[2].x = (float)rc.right;
02370         vertexList[2].y = (float)rc.bottom;
02371 
02372         vertexList[3].x = (float)rc.right;
02373         vertexList[3].y = (float)rc.top;
02374 
02375         vertexList[4].x = (float)rc.left;
02376         vertexList[4].y = (float)rc.top;
02377         
02378         return AddLine( pnLineID, vertexList, 5, Color, fWidth, fScaleRatio, bAntiAlias );
02379     }
02380 }
02381 
02382 
02383 
02384 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02385 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::RemoveLine( int nLineID )
02386 {
02387     for( int i=0; i<m_LinesList.GetSize(); i++ )
02388     {
02389         LINE_NODE* pLineNode = m_LinesList.GetAt(i);
02390         if( pLineNode && pLineNode->nLineID == nLineID )
02391         {
02392             SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY( pLineNode->pVertexList );
02393             delete pLineNode;
02394             m_LinesList.SetAt(i, NULL);
02395         }
02396     }
02397 
02398     return S_OK;
02399 }
02400 
02401 
02402 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02403 HRESULT CDXUTLineManager::RemoveAllLines()
02404 {
02405     for( int i=0; i<m_LinesList.GetSize(); i++ )
02406     {
02407         LINE_NODE* pLineNode = m_LinesList.GetAt(i);
02408         if( pLineNode )
02409         {
02410             SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY( pLineNode->pVertexList );
02411             delete pLineNode;
02412         }
02413     }
02414     m_LinesList.RemoveAll();
02415 
02416     return S_OK;
02417 }

02420 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02421 CDXUTTextHelper::CDXUTTextHelper( ID3DXFont* pFont, ID3DXSprite* pSprite, int nLineHeight )
02422 {
02423     m_pFont = pFont;
02424     m_pSprite = pSprite;
02425     m_clr = D3DXCOLOR(1,1,1,1);
02426     m_pt.x = 0; 
02427     m_pt.y = 0; 
02428     m_nLineHeight = nLineHeight;
02429 }

02432 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02433 HRESULT CDXUTTextHelper::DrawFormattedTextLine( const WCHAR* strMsg, ... )
02434 {
02435     WCHAR strBuffer[512];
02436     
02437     va_list args;
02438     va_start(args, strMsg);
02439     StringCchVPrintf( strBuffer, 512, strMsg, args );
02440     strBuffer[511] = L'\0';
02441     va_end(args);
02442 
02443     return DrawTextLine( strBuffer );
02444 }
02445 
02446 
02447 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02448 HRESULT CDXUTTextHelper::DrawTextLine( const WCHAR* strMsg )
02449 {
02450     if( NULL == m_pFont ) 
02451         return DXUT_ERR_MSGBOX( L"DrawTextLine", E_INVALIDARG );
02452 
02453     HRESULT hr;
02454     RECT rc;
02455     SetRect( &rc, m_pt.x, m_pt.y, 0, 0 ); 
02456     hr = m_pFont->DrawText( m_pSprite, strMsg, -1, &rc, DT_NOCLIP, m_clr );
02457     if( FAILED(hr) )
02458         return DXTRACE_ERR_MSGBOX( L"DrawText", hr );
02459 
02460     m_pt.y += m_nLineHeight;
02461 
02462     return S_OK;
02463 }
02464 
02465 
02466 HRESULT CDXUTTextHelper::DrawFormattedTextLine( RECT &rc, DWORD dwFlags, const WCHAR* strMsg, ... )
02467 {
02468     WCHAR strBuffer[512];
02469     
02470     va_list args;
02471     va_start(args, strMsg);
02472     StringCchVPrintf( strBuffer, 512, strMsg, args );
02473     strBuffer[511] = L'\0';
02474     va_end(args);
02475 
02476     return DrawTextLine( rc, dwFlags, strBuffer );
02477 }
02478 
02479 
02480 HRESULT CDXUTTextHelper::DrawTextLine( RECT &rc, DWORD dwFlags, const WCHAR* strMsg )
02481 {
02482     if( NULL == m_pFont ) 
02483         return DXUT_ERR_MSGBOX( L"DrawTextLine", E_INVALIDARG );
02484 
02485     HRESULT hr;
02486     hr = m_pFont->DrawText( m_pSprite, strMsg, -1, &rc, dwFlags, m_clr );
02487     if( FAILED(hr) )
02488         return DXTRACE_ERR_MSGBOX( L"DrawText", hr );
02489 
02490     m_pt.y += m_nLineHeight;
02491 
02492     return S_OK;
02493 }

02509 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02510 IDirect3DDevice9* CDXUTDirectionWidget::s_pd3dDevice = NULL;
02511 ID3DXEffect*      CDXUTDirectionWidget::s_pEffect = NULL;       
02512 ID3DXMesh*        CDXUTDirectionWidget::s_pMesh = NULL;    
02513 
02514 
02515 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02516 CDXUTDirectionWidget::CDXUTDirectionWidget()
02517 {
02518     m_fRadius = 1.0f;
02519     m_vDefaultDir = D3DXVECTOR3(0,1,0);
02520     m_vCurrentDir = m_vDefaultDir;
02521     m_nRotateMask = MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON;
02522 
02523     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mView );
02524     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mRot );
02525     D3DXMatrixIdentity( &m_mRotSnapshot );
02526 }
02527 
02528 
02529 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02530 HRESULT CDXUTDirectionWidget::StaticOnCreateDevice( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice )
02531 {
02532     WCHAR str[MAX_PATH];
02533     HRESULT hr;
02534 
02535     s_pd3dDevice = pd3dDevice;
02536    
02537     // Read the D3DX effect file
02538     V_RETURN( DXUTFindDXSDKMediaFileCch( str, MAX_PATH, L"UI\\DXUTShared.fx" ) );
02539 
02540     // If this fails, there should be debug output as to 
02541     // why the .fx file failed to compile
02542     V_RETURN( D3DXCreateEffectFromFile( s_pd3dDevice, str, NULL, NULL, D3DXFX_NOT_CLONEABLE, NULL, &s_pEffect, NULL ) );
02543 
02544     // Load the mesh with D3DX and get back a ID3DXMesh*.  For this
02545     // sample we'll ignore the X file's embedded materials since we know 
02546     // exactly the model we're loading.  See the mesh samples such as
02547     // "OptimizedMesh" for a more generic mesh loading example.
02548     V_RETURN( DXUTFindDXSDKMediaFileCch( str, MAX_PATH, L"UI\\arrow.x" ) );
02549 
02550     V_RETURN( D3DXLoadMeshFromX( str, D3DXMESH_MANAGED, s_pd3dDevice, NULL, 
02551                                  NULL, NULL, NULL, &s_pMesh) );
02552 
02553     // Optimize the mesh for this graphics card's vertex cache 
02554     // so when rendering the mesh's triangle list the vertices will 
02555     // cache hit more often so it won't have to re-execute the vertex shader 
02556     // on those vertices so it will improve perf.     
02557     DWORD* rgdwAdjacency = DX_NEW DWORD[s_pMesh->GetNumFaces() * 3];
02558     if( rgdwAdjacency == NULL )
02559         return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
02560     V( s_pMesh->GenerateAdjacency(1e-6f,rgdwAdjacency) );
02561     V( s_pMesh->OptimizeInplace(D3DXMESHOPT_VERTEXCACHE, rgdwAdjacency, NULL, NULL, NULL) );
02562     delete []rgdwAdjacency;
02563 
02564     return S_OK;
02565 }
02566 
02567 
02568 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02569 HRESULT CDXUTDirectionWidget::OnResetDevice( const D3DSURFACE_DESC* pBackBufferSurfaceDesc )
02570 {
02571     m_ArcBall.SetWindow( pBackBufferSurfaceDesc->Width, pBackBufferSurfaceDesc->Height );
02572     return S_OK;
02573 }
02574 
02575 
02576 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02577 void CDXUTDirectionWidget::StaticOnLostDevice()
02578 {
02579     if( s_pEffect )
02580         s_pEffect->OnLostDevice();
02581 }
02582 
02583 
02584 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02585 void CDXUTDirectionWidget::StaticOnDestroyDevice()
02586 {
02587     SAFE_RELEASE(s_pEffect);
02588     SAFE_RELEASE(s_pMesh);
02589 }    
02590 
02591 
02592 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02593 LRESULT CDXUTDirectionWidget::HandleMessages( HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, 
02594                                               WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
02595 {
02596     switch( uMsg )
02597     {
02598         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
02599         case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
02600         case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
02601         {
02602             if( ((m_nRotateMask & MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) != 0 && uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN) ||
02603                 ((m_nRotateMask & MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON) != 0 && uMsg == WM_MBUTTONDOWN) ||
02604                 ((m_nRotateMask & MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON) != 0 && uMsg == WM_RBUTTONDOWN) )
02605             {
02606                 int iMouseX = (int)(short)LOWORD(lParam);
02607                 int iMouseY = (int)(short)HIWORD(lParam);
02608                 m_ArcBall.OnBegin( iMouseX, iMouseY );
02609                 SetCapture(hWnd);
02610             }
02611             return TRUE;
02612         }
02613 
02614         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
02615         {
02616             if( m_ArcBall.IsBeingDragged() )
02617             {
02618                 int iMouseX = (int)(short)LOWORD(lParam);
02619                 int iMouseY = (int)(short)HIWORD(lParam);
02620                 m_ArcBall.OnMove( iMouseX, iMouseY );
02621                 UpdateLightDir();
02622             }
02623             return TRUE;
02624         }
02625 
02626         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
02627         case WM_MBUTTONUP:
02628         case WM_RBUTTONUP:
02629         {
02630             if( ((m_nRotateMask & MOUSE_LEFT_BUTTON) != 0 && uMsg == WM_LBUTTONUP) ||
02631                 ((m_nRotateMask & MOUSE_MIDDLE_BUTTON) != 0 && uMsg == WM_MBUTTONUP) ||
02632                 ((m_nRotateMask & MOUSE_RIGHT_BUTTON) != 0 && uMsg == WM_RBUTTONUP) )
02633             {
02634                 m_ArcBall.OnEnd();
02635                 ReleaseCapture();
02636             }
02637 
02638             UpdateLightDir();
02639             return TRUE;
02640         }
02641     }
02642 
02643     return 0;
02644 }
02645 
02646 
02647 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02648 HRESULT CDXUTDirectionWidget::OnRender( D3DXCOLOR color, const D3DXMATRIX* pmView, 
02649                                         const D3DXMATRIX* pmProj, const D3DXVECTOR3* pEyePt )
02650 {
02651     m_mView = *pmView;
02652 
02653     // Render the light spheres so the user can visually see the light dir
02654     UINT iPass, cPasses;
02655     D3DXMATRIX mRotate;
02656     D3DXMATRIX mScale;
02657     D3DXMATRIX mTrans;
02658     D3DXMATRIXA16 mWorldViewProj;
02659     HRESULT hr;
02660 
02661     V( s_pEffect->SetTechnique( "RenderWith1LightNoTexture" ) );
02662     V( s_pEffect->SetVector( "g_MaterialDiffuseColor", (D3DXVECTOR4*)&color ) );
02663 
02664     D3DXVECTOR3 vEyePt;
02665     D3DXVec3Normalize( &vEyePt, pEyePt );
02666     V( s_pEffect->SetValue( "g_LightDir", &vEyePt, sizeof(D3DXVECTOR3) ) );
02667 
02668     // Rotate arrow model to point towards origin
02669     D3DXMATRIX mRotateA, mRotateB;
02670     D3DXVECTOR3 vAt = D3DXVECTOR3(0,0,0);
02671     D3DXVECTOR3 vUp = D3DXVECTOR3(0,1,0);
02672     D3DXMatrixRotationX( &mRotateB, D3DX_PI );
02673     D3DXMatrixLookAtLH( &mRotateA, &m_vCurrentDir, &vAt, &vUp );
02674     D3DXMatrixInverse( &mRotateA, NULL, &mRotateA );
02675     mRotate = mRotateB * mRotateA;
02676 
02677     D3DXVECTOR3 vL = m_vCurrentDir * m_fRadius * 1.0f;
02678     D3DXMatrixTranslation( &mTrans, vL.x, vL.y, vL.z );
02679     D3DXMatrixScaling( &mScale, m_fRadius*0.2f, m_fRadius*0.2f, m_fRadius*0.2f );
02680 
02681     D3DXMATRIX mWorld = mRotate * mScale * mTrans;
02682     mWorldViewProj = mWorld * (m_mView) * (*pmProj);
02683 
02684     V( s_pEffect->SetMatrix( "g_mWorldViewProjection", &mWorldViewProj ) );
02685     V( s_pEffect->SetMatrix( "g_mWorld", &mWorld ) );
02686 
02687     for( int iSubset=0; iSubset<2; iSubset++ )
02688     {
02689         V( s_pEffect->Begin(&cPasses, 0) );
02690         for (iPass = 0; iPass < cPasses; iPass++)
02691         {
02692             V( s_pEffect->BeginPass(iPass) );
02693             V( s_pMesh->DrawSubset(iSubset) );
02694             V( s_pEffect->EndPass() );
02695         }
02696         V( s_pEffect->End() );
02697     }
02698 
02699     return S_OK;
02700 }
02701 
02702 
02703 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02704 HRESULT CDXUTDirectionWidget::UpdateLightDir()
02705 {
02706     D3DXMATRIX mInvView;
02707     D3DXMatrixInverse(&mInvView, NULL, &m_mView);
02708     mInvView._41 = mInvView._42 = mInvView._43 = 0;
02709 
02710     D3DXMATRIX mLastRotInv;
02711     D3DXMatrixInverse(&mLastRotInv, NULL, &m_mRotSnapshot);
02712 
02713     D3DXMATRIX mRot = *m_ArcBall.GetRotationMatrix();
02714     m_mRotSnapshot = mRot;
02715 
02716     // Accumulate the delta of the arcball's rotation in view space.
02717     // Note that per-frame delta rotations could be problematic over long periods of time.
02718     m_mRot *= m_mView * mLastRotInv * mRot * mInvView;
02719 
02720     // Since we're accumulating delta rotations, we need to orthonormalize 
02721     // the matrix to prevent eventual matrix skew
02722     D3DXVECTOR3* pXBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &m_mRot._11;
02723     D3DXVECTOR3* pYBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &m_mRot._21;
02724     D3DXVECTOR3* pZBasis = (D3DXVECTOR3*) &m_mRot._31;
02725     D3DXVec3Normalize( pXBasis, pXBasis );
02726     D3DXVec3Cross( pYBasis, pZBasis, pXBasis );
02727     D3DXVec3Normalize( pYBasis, pYBasis );
02728     D3DXVec3Cross( pZBasis, pXBasis, pYBasis );
02729 
02730     // Transform the default direction vector by the light's rotation matrix
02731     D3DXVec3TransformNormal( &m_vCurrentDir, &m_vDefaultDir, &m_mRot );
02732 
02733     return S_OK;
02734 }
02735 
02736 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02737 // Direct3D9 dynamic linking support -- calls top-level D3D9 APIs with graceful
02738 // failure if APIs are not present.
02739 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02740 
02741 // Function prototypes
02742 typedef IDirect3D9* (WINAPI * LPDIRECT3DCREATE9) (UINT);
02743 typedef INT         (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_BEGINEVENT)(D3DCOLOR, LPCWSTR);
02744 typedef INT         (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_ENDEVENT)(void);
02745 typedef VOID        (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_SETMARKER)(D3DCOLOR, LPCWSTR);
02746 typedef VOID        (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_SETREGION)(D3DCOLOR, LPCWSTR);
02747 typedef BOOL        (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_QUERYREPEATFRAME)(void);
02748 typedef VOID        (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_SETOPTIONS)( DWORD dwOptions );
02749 typedef DWORD       (WINAPI * LPD3DPERF_GETSTATUS)( void );
02750 
02751 // Module and function pointers
02752 static HMODULE s_hModD3D9 = NULL;
02753 static LPDIRECT3DCREATE9 s_DynamicDirect3DCreate9 = NULL;
02754 static LPD3DPERF_BEGINEVENT s_DynamicD3DPERF_BeginEvent = NULL;
02755 static LPD3DPERF_ENDEVENT s_DynamicD3DPERF_EndEvent = NULL;
02756 static LPD3DPERF_SETMARKER s_DynamicD3DPERF_SetMarker = NULL;
02757 static LPD3DPERF_SETREGION s_DynamicD3DPERF_SetRegion = NULL;
02758 static LPD3DPERF_QUERYREPEATFRAME s_DynamicD3DPERF_QueryRepeatFrame = NULL;
02759 static LPD3DPERF_SETOPTIONS s_DynamicD3DPERF_SetOptions = NULL;
02760 static LPD3DPERF_GETSTATUS s_DynamicD3DPERF_GetStatus = NULL;
02761 
02762 // Ensure function pointers are initialized
02763 static bool DXUT_EnsureD3DAPIs( void )
02764 {
02765     // If module is non-NULL, this function has already been called.  Note
02766     // that this doesn't guarantee that all D3D9 procaddresses were found.
02767     if( s_hModD3D9 != NULL )
02768         return true;
02769 
02770     // This may fail if DirectX 9 isn't installed
02771     WCHAR wszPath[MAX_PATH+1];
02772     if( !::GetSystemDirectory( wszPath, MAX_PATH+1 ) )
02773         return false;
02774     StringCchCat( wszPath, MAX_PATH, L"\\d3d9.dll" );
02775     s_hModD3D9 = LoadLibrary( wszPath );
02776     if( s_hModD3D9 == NULL ) 
02777         return false;
02778     s_DynamicDirect3DCreate9 = (LPDIRECT3DCREATE9)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "Direct3DCreate9" );
02779     s_DynamicD3DPERF_BeginEvent = (LPD3DPERF_BEGINEVENT)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_BeginEvent" );
02780     s_DynamicD3DPERF_EndEvent = (LPD3DPERF_ENDEVENT)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_EndEvent" );
02781     s_DynamicD3DPERF_SetMarker = (LPD3DPERF_SETMARKER)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_SetMarker" );
02782     s_DynamicD3DPERF_SetRegion = (LPD3DPERF_SETREGION)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_SetRegion" );
02783     s_DynamicD3DPERF_QueryRepeatFrame = (LPD3DPERF_QUERYREPEATFRAME)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_QueryRepeatFrame" );
02784     s_DynamicD3DPERF_SetOptions = (LPD3DPERF_SETOPTIONS)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_SetOptions" );
02785     s_DynamicD3DPERF_GetStatus = (LPD3DPERF_GETSTATUS)GetProcAddress( s_hModD3D9, "D3DPERF_GetStatus" );
02786     return true;
02787 }
02788

02848 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02849 // Trace a string description of a decl 
02850 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02851 void DXUTTraceDecl( D3DVERTEXELEMENT9 decl[MAX_FVF_DECL_SIZE] )
02852 {
02853     int iDecl=0;
02854     for( iDecl=0; iDecl<MAX_FVF_DECL_SIZE; iDecl++ )
02855     {
02856         if( decl[iDecl].Stream == 0xFF )
02857             break;
02858 
02859         DXUTOutputDebugString( L"decl[%d]=Stream:%d, Offset:%d, %s, %s, %s, UsageIndex:%d\n", iDecl, 
02860                     decl[iDecl].Stream,
02861                     decl[iDecl].Offset,
02862                     DXUTTraceD3DDECLTYPEtoString( decl[iDecl].Type ),
02863                     DXUTTraceD3DDECLMETHODtoString( decl[iDecl].Method ),
02864                     DXUTTraceD3DDECLUSAGEtoString( decl[iDecl].Usage ),
02865                     decl[iDecl].UsageIndex );
02866     }
02867 
02868     DXUTOutputDebugString( L"decl[%d]=D3DDECL_END\n", iDecl );
02869 }
02870 
02871 
02872 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02873 WCHAR* DXUTTraceD3DDECLTYPEtoString( BYTE t )
02874 {
02875     switch( t )
02876     {
02877         case D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT1: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT1";
02878         case D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT2: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT2";
02879         case D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT3: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT3";
02880         case D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT4: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT4";
02881         case D3DDECLTYPE_D3DCOLOR: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_D3DCOLOR";
02882         case D3DDECLTYPE_UBYTE4: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_UBYTE4";
02883         case D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT2: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT2";
02884         case D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT4: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT4";
02885         case D3DDECLTYPE_UBYTE4N: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_UBYTE4N";
02886         case D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT2N: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT2N";
02887         case D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT4N: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_SHORT4N";
02888         case D3DDECLTYPE_USHORT2N: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_USHORT2N";
02889         case D3DDECLTYPE_USHORT4N: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_USHORT4N";
02890         case D3DDECLTYPE_UDEC3: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_UDEC3";
02891         case D3DDECLTYPE_DEC3N: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_DEC3N";
02892         case D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT16_2: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT16_2";
02893         case D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT16_4: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_FLOAT16_4";
02894         case D3DDECLTYPE_UNUSED: return L"D3DDECLTYPE_UNUSED";
02895         default: return L"D3DDECLTYPE Unknown";
02896     }
02897 }
